job_text: ['', 'Work with science and engineering team to architect and develop operational models that run at scale', 'Being able to tackle vaguely formulated problems while understanding the underlying business notion.', '3+ years of industry experience designing, developing, and shipping software or developing models for machine learning.', 'Great problem solving and analytical skills.', 'Design, prototype, and build Machine Learning Models to derive actionable intelligence for our products: MSN, Bing, Advertising.', 'Familiarity with distributed data processing/analysis and modeling paradigms, such as Map-Reduce.', 'Strong coding abilities in C#, C++, Java, R, or Python.', 'Effective communication skills, both verbal and written.', 'Experimentation infrastructure, including tools for configuring and launching experiments, dashboard, live marketplace monitoring, and diagnosis.\u202f', 'Experience in at least one deep learning framework such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc.', 'Analyze and take decisions based on complex and ambiguous (big) data points.', 'Contribute to creating knowledge around user/query intent understanding, document/ad understanding, user targeting, relevance modeling, user response prediction, using large scale machine learning algorithms', 'Partner with other teams to identify and explore opportunities for product improvement', 'Passionate, self-motivated.', 'Responsibilities', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Physics, or related disciplines. Ph.D. is preferred.3+ years of industry experience designing, developing, and shipping software or developing models for machine learning.Experience in at least one deep learning framework such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, etc.Strong coding abilities in C#, C++, Java, R, or Python.Familiarity with distributed data processing/analysis and modeling paradigms, such as Map-Reduce.Being able to tackle vaguely formulated problems while understanding the underlying business notion.Great problem solving and analytical skills.Passionate, self-motivated.Effective communication skills, both verbal and written.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Physics, or related disciplines. Ph.D. is preferred.', 'Qualifications', 'Design, prototype, and build Machine Learning Models to derive actionable intelligence for our products: MSN, Bing, Advertising.Analyze and take decisions based on complex and ambiguous (big) data points.Work closely with our PM, design, and privacy teams to define feature specifications and build the next generation of products.Contribute to creating knowledge around user/query intent understanding, document/ad understanding, user targeting, relevance modeling, user response prediction, using large scale machine learning algorithmsExperimentation infrastructure, including tools for configuring and launching experiments, dashboard, live marketplace monitoring, and diagnosis.\u202fWork with science and engineering team to architect and develop operational models that run at scalePartner with other teams to identify and explore opportunities for product improvement', 'Work closely with our PM, design, and privacy teams to define feature specifications and build the next generation of products.']

['', 'The skills to work cross-functionally and push business partners to focus on realistic goals and projects.', "Dive into Zillow's internal and third party data (think Hive, Presto, SQL Server, Redshift, Python, Mode Analytics, Tableau, R) to make strategic recommendations (e.g., personalized user flows, segmented marketing audiences, more accurate forecasts).", 'Tell stories that describe analytical results and insights in meetings of all sizes with diverse audiences.', 'About The Role', 'Develop a common language and approach to analyzing and communicating information and insights across teams.', 'Foundational analytical skills (proven understanding of SQL, command of Excel, and experience using R and/or Python) and a Tableau pro.', '2+ years of work experience involving quantitative data analysis and complex problem solving (preferably focused on consumer-facing internet products).', 'Consult with business partners and provide insight to a variety of non-technical audiences to ensure that all levels of Zillow Group make data-driven decisions.', 'Create, maintain, and document a robust set of metrics to monitor day-to-day bug detection and long-term performance tracking.', 'Zillow Group is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment with the best employees. Therefore, we provide employment opportunities without regard to age, race, color, ancestry, national origin, religion, disability, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law. If there are preparations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.', "Dive into Zillow's internal and third party data (think Hive, Presto, SQL Server, Redshift, Python, Mode Analytics, Tableau, R) to make strategic recommendations (e.g., personalized user flows, segmented marketing audiences, more accurate forecasts).Assist in the prioritization and development of new product features and business initiatives. Compile and analyze data describing the performance of those initiatives (e.g., AB tests, pilots, incrementality tests).Develop a common language and approach to analyzing and communicating information and insights across teams.Create, maintain, and document a robust set of metrics to monitor day-to-day bug detection and long-term performance tracking.Tell stories that describe analytical results and insights in meetings of all sizes with diverse audiences.Consult with business partners and provide insight to a variety of non-technical audiences to ensure that all levels of Zillow Group make data-driven decisions.", 'About The Team', 'An understanding of concepts, terminology, and measurement issues related to web traffic.', "An undergraduate or Master's degree in a quantitative field (e.g. science, engineering, economics, finance, statistics, or similar) or demonstrable experience within data science and analytics.", 'Assist in the prioritization and development of new product features and business initiatives. Compile and analyze data describing the performance of those initiatives (e.g., AB tests, pilots, incrementality tests).', 'Experience directly querying multi-terabyte-sized data sets (e.g. with Hive and Presto) including clickstream data and raw data ingested from non-standard platforms (e.g., homegrown systems).', 'Strong written, verbal, and visual communication skills to concisely communicate in a way that provides context, offers insights, and minimizes misinterpretation.', "We're Looking For a Seasoned Data Scientist Who Has", "An undergraduate or Master's degree in a quantitative field (e.g. science, engineering, economics, finance, statistics, or similar) or demonstrable experience within data science and analytics.2+ years of work experience involving quantitative data analysis and complex problem solving (preferably focused on consumer-facing internet products).Foundational analytical skills (proven understanding of SQL, command of Excel, and experience using R and/or Python) and a Tableau pro.Experience directly querying multi-terabyte-sized data sets (e.g. with Hive and Presto) including clickstream data and raw data ingested from non-standard platforms (e.g., homegrown systems).An understanding of concepts, terminology, and measurement issues related to web traffic.Strong written, verbal, and visual communication skills to concisely communicate in a way that provides context, offers insights, and minimizes misinterpretation.The skills to work cross-functionally and push business partners to focus on realistic goals and projects."]

['', 'Engineer features by using your business acumen to find new ways to combine disparate internal and external data sources.', 'Create repeatable, interpretable, dynamic and scalable models that are seamlessly incorporated into analytic data products.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Share your passion for Data Science with the broader enterprise community; identify and develop long-term processes, frameworks, tools, methods and standards.', 'Bias for action, with the ability to deliver outstanding results through task prioritization and time management', 'Requirements:', 'Experience with data visualization tools — Tableau, R Shiny, etc. preferred', 'As a Data Scientist, you will apply strong expertise in AI through the use of machine learning, data mining, and information retrieval to design, prototype, and build next generation advanced analytics engines and services. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams and business partners to define the technical problem statement and hypotheses to test. You will develop efficient and accurate analytical models which mimic business decisions and incorporate those models into analytical data products and tools. You will have the opportunity to drive current and future strategy by leveraging your analytical skills as you ensure business value and communicate the results.', 'This position offers an excellent opportunity for significant career development in a fast-growing and challenging entrepreneurial environment with a high degree of individual responsibility.', 'Benefits:', 'Stay connected with external sources of ideas through conferences and community engagements', 'Proficiency with Machine Learning concepts and modeling techniques to solve problems such as clustering, classification, regression, anomaly detection, simulation and optimization problems on large scale data sets. ', 'Tiger Analytics is looking for experienced Data Scientists to join our fast-growing advanced analytics consulting firm.  Our employees bring deep expertise in Data Science, Machine Learning and AI.  We are the trusted analytics partner for multiple Fortune 500 companies, enabling them to generate business value from data. Our business value and leadership has been recognized by various market research firms, including Forrester and Gartner. We are looking for top-notch talent as we continue to build the best global analytics consulting team in the world.  ', ' Bachelors Degree in Data Science, Computer Science, or related field 2-5 years of Data Science and Machine Learning experience required Proficiency in Python or R. Ability to write complex SQL queries Proficiency with Machine Learning concepts and modeling techniques to solve problems such as clustering, classification, regression, anomaly detection, simulation and optimization problems on large scale data sets.  Ability to implement ML best practices for the entire Data Science lifecycle Ability to apply various analytical models to business use cases (NLP, Supervised, Un-Supervised, Neural Nets, etc.) Exceptional communication and collaboration skills to understand business partner needs and deliver solutions Bias for action, with the ability to deliver outstanding results through task prioritization and time management Experience with data visualization tools — Tableau, R Shiny, etc. preferred ', 'Collaborate with business partners to develop innovative solutions to meet objectives utilizing cutting edge techniques and tools.', '2-5 years of Data Science and Machine Learning experience required', ' Collaborate with business partners to develop innovative solutions to meet objectives utilizing cutting edge techniques and tools. Effectively communicate the analytics approach and how it will meet and address objectives to business partners.  Advocate and educate on the value of data-driven decision making; focus on the "how and why" of solutioning. Lead analytic approaches; integrate solutions collaboratively into applications and tools with data engineers, business leads, analysts and developers. Create repeatable, interpretable, dynamic and scalable models that are seamlessly incorporated into analytic data products. Engineer features by using your business acumen to find new ways to combine disparate internal and external data sources. Share your passion for Data Science with the broader enterprise community; identify and develop long-term processes, frameworks, tools, methods and standards. Collaborate, coach, and learn with a growing team of experienced Data Scientists.  Stay connected with external sources of ideas through conferences and community engagements ', 'Effectively communicate the analytics approach and how it will meet and address objectives to business partners. ', 'Exceptional communication and collaboration skills to understand business partner needs and deliver solutions', 'Advocate and educate on the value of data-driven decision making; focus on the "how and why" of solutioning.', 'Ability to implement ML best practices for the entire Data Science lifecycle', 'Collaborate, coach, and learn with a growing team of experienced Data Scientists. ', 'Ability to apply various analytical models to business use cases (NLP, Supervised, Un-Supervised, Neural Nets, etc.)', 'Bachelors Degree in Data Science, Computer Science, or related field', 'Lead analytic approaches; integrate solutions collaboratively into applications and tools with data engineers, business leads, analysts and developers.', 'Proficiency in Python or R. Ability to write complex SQL queries']

['', 'To help you succeed, we provide a supportive environment that fosters collaboration between teams and team members, where learning and professional growth are considered a key part of your success, and of ours. We offer a flexible work environment with a family friendly work-life balance.', 'At least 3-5 years of professional industry experience, in addition to your academic experience', 'Strong programming experience in two or more of the following: Scala / Java, R, Python', 'Quantifind helps some of the world’s biggest banks catch money laundering and fraud. Quantifind also works with government agencies to use the same platform to uncover criminal networks and combat election tampering. Unlike other players in this space, Quantifind delivers results as software-as-a-service (SaaS) with consumer-grade user experiences.\xa0', 'Who We Are', 'MS or higher in the following areas: Statistics and MathematicsAt least 3-5 years of professional industry experience, in addition to your academic experienceStrong programming experience in two or more of the following: Scala / Java, R, PythonOutstanding quantitative analytical abilityAble to take less than precise business requirements and translate them into statistical problems which you enjoy solvingCan develop methods and algorithms from first principles where necessary as opposed to relying fully on packaged third party solutionsExcellent written and verbal communication skills, with prior experience explaining assumptions, conclusions and methodology to both internal and external customersIn-depth knowledge of Statistics / Probability / Machine Learning including core Statistical concepts such as hypothesis testing, estimation, and inference, and Machine Learning foundations such as bias/variance trade-off, regularization, dimension reduction, and model interpretationSupervised and unsupervised statistical techniques such as regression (linear / logistic / tree based ensembles), clusteringExperience with unstructured text data using NLP methods such as Named Entity Recognition, Topic Modeling, Large Scale Document Classification, Word Embeddings, and Text SimilarityBasic knowledge of data structures and algorithms with a focus on complexity and performance implicationsExperience with SQL', 'Able to take less than precise business requirements and translate them into statistical problems which you enjoy solving', 'Will you join us? Apply now!', 'You are a full-stack data scientist, an experienced quantitative thinker who wants to develop further as both a data scientist and an engineer. You are skilled at finding the precise mathematical kernels of real-world business challenges faced by leading international financial institutions. You want to apply your expertise in statistics and computer science using Quantifind’s state-of-the-art infrastructure to solve problems in Natural Language Processing such as Entity Linking, Text Classification, and Topic Modeling. You are excited to work at a fast growing company where you will have the chance to expand your scientific and engineering skills in new areas. You share Quantifind’s commitment to winning together, and are eager to see your coworkers build on the technical foundations you will be creating. You are passionate about maintaining the high scientific and engineering standards required to enable your peers. Above all, you are a curious and independent problem solver who is motivated to find a place where your skills can have real impact.', 'MS or higher in the following areas: Statistics and Mathematics', 'Experience with unstructured text data using NLP methods such as Named Entity Recognition, Topic Modeling, Large Scale Document Classification, Word Embeddings, and Text Similarity', 'What a Great Candidate Looks Like:\xa0', 'The Opportunity We Offer', 'Can develop methods and algorithms from first principles where necessary as opposed to relying fully on packaged third party solutions', 'Quantifind is seeking to fill a Full-Stack Data Scientist position in Menlo Park, CA on our Data Science team. We work closely with the Product Management team and Platform engineers to anticipate company needs and quickly put state-of-the-art mathematical tools into the hands of end users. Members of the Data Science team translate real world problems into quantitative language, find or create algorithms to solve those problems, and implement them in code. Our team values a creative and empathetic approach to problem solving and strives to maintain rigorous scientific and engineering standards. We will give you the opportunity to work on the full data science pipeline, bringing solutions from basic research all the way to production.', 'In-depth knowledge of Statistics / Probability / Machine Learning including core Statistical concepts such as hypothesis testing, estimation, and inference, and Machine Learning foundations such as bias/variance trade-off, regularization, dimension reduction, and model interpretation', 'Experience with SQL', 'Outstanding quantitative analytical ability', 'Basic knowledge of data structures and algorithms with a focus on complexity and performance implications', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with prior experience explaining assumptions, conclusions and methodology to both internal and external customers', 'Quantifind is a data science technology company whose AI platform uncovers signals of risk across disparate and unstructured text sources. In financial crimes risk management, Quantifind’s solution uniquely combines internal financial institution data with public domain data to assess risk in the context of Know Your Customer (KYC), Customer Due Diligence (CDD), Fraud Risk Management, and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) processes. Today these compliance processes are burdened by ever-increasing regulatory responsibilities and an expectation of frictionless transactions. Legacy technologies demand increasingly more human resources as the operations expand; Quantifind’s solution offers a way to cut through the inefficiency and enhance effectiveness simultaneously.\xa0\xa0', 'Quantifind is operating fully remote for the foreseeable future, but we envision an eventual return to work that includes regular in-person touchpoints and shared office space. When this time comes, a Silicon Valley home base will help facilitate interactions with our Silicon Valley-based development team.', 'Supervised and unsupervised statistical techniques such as regression (linear / logistic / tree based ensembles), clustering', 'We are an equal opportunity employer; we have a fun place to work and a devotion to succeeding together.', 'Who You Are']

['', 'Non-hierarchical, with a willingness to roll-up your sleeves, multitask and dive into details', 'Health Care, Vision, Dental', 'Proactively challenge assumptions and surface opportunities. Find new and better ways to do what we’re doing.', 'As the first Data Scientist at Papa, you will play a key role in improving our user experience and the health of our marketplace. You will partner with business owners across growth, product, and operations to understand goals, craft KPIs, and measure ongoing performance.\xa0', 'Market competitive salary', 'Fully understand Papa’s data landscape and data management capabilities, including data sources, data pipelines, data warehouse, and data visualization tool.Develop attribution models to help optimize growth efforts.Design and add new features to data warehouse models to enable analysis.Determine which multi-touch attribution model is most useful to the business.Explore high-level questions like “What are the patterns of our most successful users?”Proactively challenge assumptions and surface opportunities. Find new and better ways to do what we’re doing.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Strong communication skills, ability to explain complex problems, and to share and visualize findings with business stakeholders.', 'Experience working with Data warehouses such as Snowflake.', 'Explore high-level questions like “What are the patterns of our most successful users?”', 'A lack of ego, driven by group outcome, not the individual outcome', 'Bonus provided based on individual goals', 'Health benefits', 'Market competitive salaryBonus provided based on individual goalsHealth benefitsHealth Care, Vision, DentalPTO + paid holidays (available after 90-days)401K + matchingStock Options', 'Fully understand Papa’s data landscape and data management capabilities, including data sources, data pipelines, data warehouse, and data visualization tool.', 'Degree in data science, computer science, math, statistics, engineering, operational research, a related quantitative field, or equivalent experience.', 'Expertise with SQL (and relational databases) and data visualization tools such as Looker for data exploration and ad hoc analysis.', 'PTO + paid holidays (available after 90-days)', 'Experience in media or marketing analytics, including campaign measurement, cross-platform deduplication and lookalike modeling, or multi-touch attribution modeling.Experience designing and analyzing experiments to measure the impact of new features.', 'Requirements', 'Salary & Benefits:', 'Papa, Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. We proudly support the ParityPledge® for gender and/or racial parity at the highest levels of business.', 'Initially, you will work with product, growth, and engineering teams to ensure we have the proper instrumentation in place to deliver on these metrics. This may include input into expanding Papa’s data management capabilities. Your work will be crucial to architecting and building our data infrastructure.', '3+ years work experience in data science and analytics, with a focus on marketing analytics, statistical modeling, machine learning, forecasting, optimization and visualization to solve real-world problems', 'Experience in media or marketing analytics, including campaign measurement, cross-platform deduplication and lookalike modeling, or multi-touch attribution modeling.', 'Design and add new features to data warehouse models to enable analysis.', 'About the Role', '401K + matching', 'Proficiency in Python and/or R for data analysis.', 'Experience designing and analyzing experiments to measure the impact of new features.', 'Additional Responsibilities', 'Determine which multi-touch attribution model is most useful to the business.', 'Papa’s mission is to support families throughout the aging journey. Every day 11,000 people in the United States turn 65. Loneliness is a disease and Social Determinants of Health have huge impacts on people’s lives. The Papa team and our tens of thousands of Papa Pals are here to provide companionship, support, and care to millions of families.\xa0', 'Develop attribution models to help optimize growth efforts.', 'Committed to supporting a diverse, inclusive, and collaborative work environment', 'Non-hierarchical, with a willingness to roll-up your sleeves, multitask and dive into detailsA lack of ego, driven by group outcome, not the individual outcomeCommitted to supporting a diverse, inclusive, and collaborative work environmentDegree in data science, computer science, math, statistics, engineering, operational research, a related quantitative field, or equivalent experience.3+ years work experience in data science and analytics, with a focus on marketing analytics, statistical modeling, machine learning, forecasting, optimization and visualization to solve real-world problemsProficiency in Python and/or R for data analysis.Expertise with SQL (and relational databases) and data visualization tools such as Looker for data exploration and ad hoc analysis.Experience working with Data warehouses such as Snowflake.Strong communication skills, ability to explain complex problems, and to share and visualize findings with business stakeholders.Demonstrated ability to deal with ambiguity and juggle between multiple priorities, leading high quality work and adhering to tight deadlines.', 'Demonstrated ability to deal with ambiguity and juggle between multiple priorities, leading high quality work and adhering to tight deadlines.', 'Stock Options', 'You will subsequently use advanced statistical techniques to analyze large data sets and identify key insights to inform growth opportunities, product improvements, and business strategy. You will help ensure that our teams are asking the right questions and help find those answers.', 'Backed by amazing partners, Papa has raised over $31M in funding. Our investors include Canaan, Comcast Ventures, Operator Partners, Magnify Ventures, Pivotal Ventures (Melinda Gates’ fund), Initialized Capital, Sound Ventures (Ashton Kutcher’s fund), and YCombinator.', 'Additional Responsibilities\xa0']

['', 'What We’ll Like About You', ' We work on problems that affect the lives of real people. Our users depend on us to make positive changes to their health and their lives. We base our work on scientifically-proven, peer-reviewed methodologies that are designed by medical professionals. We are a data-driven company through and through. We’re a respectful, diverse, and dynamic environment in which Engineering is a first-class citizen, and where you’ll be able to work on a variety of interesting problems that affect the lives of real people. We offer a generous budget for personal development expenses like training courses, conferences, and books. You’ll get three weeks’ paid vacation and a flexible work policy that is remote- and family-friendly (about 50% of our engineering team is fully remote). We worry about results, not time spent in seats. ', 'We work on problems that affect the lives of real people. Our users depend on us to make positive changes to their health and their lives.', 'We base our work on scientifically-proven, peer-reviewed methodologies that are designed by medical professionals.', 'You’ll get three weeks’ paid vacation and a flexible work policy that is remote- and family-friendly (about 50% of our engineering team is fully remote). We worry about results, not time spent in seats.', 'We offer a generous budget for personal development expenses like training courses, conferences, and books.', 'You have 4+ years of experience as a Data Scientist or Data Analyst in a similarly-sized organization, with a proven record of analysis and research that positively impacts your team.', 'You possess excellent communication skills and the ability to clearly communicate technical concepts to a non-technical audience', 'You are comfortable writing Python code, and have good working knowledge of pandas and numpy. We don’t expect you to write production-quality code, but you should have some programming experience.', ' You have 4+ years of experience as a Data Scientist or Data Analyst in a similarly-sized organization, with a proven record of analysis and research that positively impacts your team. You possess excellent communication skills and the ability to clearly communicate technical concepts to a non-technical audience You possess excellent SQL/relational algebra skills, ideally with at least a basic knowledge of how different types of databases (e.g.: column vs row storage) work. You have a superior knowledge of statistical analysis methods, such as input selection, logistic and standard regression, etc. You are comfortable writing Python code, and have good working knowledge of pandas and numpy. We don’t expect you to write production-quality code, but you should have some programming experience. You are comfortable with at least “medium data” technologies and how to transcend the “memory bound” nature of most analytics tools.', 'We’re a respectful, diverse, and dynamic environment in which Engineering is a first-class citizen, and where you’ll be able to work on a variety of interesting problems that affect the lives of real people.', 'You are comfortable with at least “medium data” technologies and how to transcend the “memory bound” nature of most analytics tools.', 'What You’ll Like About Us', 'We are a data-driven company through and through.', 'You have a superior knowledge of statistical analysis methods, such as input selection, logistic and standard regression, etc.', 'You possess excellent SQL/relational algebra skills, ideally with at least a basic knowledge of how different types of databases (e.g.: column vs row storage) work.']

['', 'BA/BS in a quantitative field -- MS or PhD preferred', 'We’re looking for a Data Scientist to build data products addressing some of our toughest problems in the demand planning and logistics domains. You’ll be combining strong modeling and inference skills, along with a deep understanding of the business to deliver decision making systems that allow us to scale the backbone of the company. This role has a high level of ownership- we really want someone who is not afraid to think big, while also having the pragmatic toolkit to efficiently ship impactful data models.\xa0', 'Build the scaffolding to support the maintenance of deployed models, such as automated diagnostics, quality checks, etc.', 'Track record of shipping data products: being able to write production level data science code while also conceptually understanding tradeoffs in production systems', 'Expertise in a computing language (R/Python), including strong data toolkit within your respective language (we’re interested in hearing about your “bread and butter”, whether it’s tidyverse + ggplot2, or pandas + seaborn, etc.)', 'Partner with the business to flesh out the parameters and goals of data science problems', 'Use data analysis to answer questions around demand patterns, supply chain efficiency, and return rate tendencies', 'Develop and productionize forecasting models that allow us to better predict future demand at varying dimensions and levels', 'The data team at Everlane is tasked with enabling the company to use data to make decisions and improve our product, tackling problems spanning operations, marketing, product, and ecommerce. Our data scientists lean on a full-stack set of methodologies and tools to solve these problems, taking an initial open ended question to the eventual business implementation of a model.', "We'd love to hear from you if you have:", 'Expertise in SQL and querying databases in order to perform analysis and build predictive models', '2+ years specific experience in forecasting, operations research, and/or optimization', '\xa0', 'Create robust optimization frameworks, thinking through the right tradeoffs and rewards for transportation, fulfillment, and physical retail', 'Your day-to-day:', 'Partner with the business to flesh out the parameters and goals of data science problemsUse data analysis to answer questions around demand patterns, supply chain efficiency, and return rate tendenciesDesign experiments (both natural and RCTs), and study their results to identify important causal levers within the companyDevelop and productionize forecasting models that allow us to better predict future demand at varying dimensions and levelsCreate robust optimization frameworks, thinking through the right tradeoffs and rewards for transportation, fulfillment, and physical retailBuild the scaffolding to support the maintenance of deployed models, such as automated diagnostics, quality checks, etc.', "At Everlane, we want the right choice to be as easy as putting on a great T-shirt. That’s why we partner with ethical factories around the world. Work with high quality and more sustainably sourced materials. And share the true cost of every product we make. But there's a lot more work to be done, and we're excited to be growing a team of motivated humans that are up for the challenge.", '4+ years experience as a data scientist in industry solving operational problems', 'Design experiments (both natural and RCTs), and study their results to identify important causal levers within the company', 'Comfort in a cloud computing environment (we’re an AWS shop) and/or navigating a command-line based environment', 'BA/BS in a quantitative field -- MS or PhD preferred4+ years experience as a data scientist in industry solving operational problems2+ years specific experience in forecasting, operations research, and/or optimizationTrack record of shipping data products: being able to write production level data science code while also conceptually understanding tradeoffs in production systemsStrong understanding of statistics and predictive modelingExpertise in SQL and querying databases in order to perform analysis and build predictive modelsExpertise in a computing language (R/Python), including strong data toolkit within your respective language (we’re interested in hearing about your “bread and butter”, whether it’s tidyverse + ggplot2, or pandas + seaborn, etc.)Comfort in a cloud computing environment (we’re an AWS shop) and/or navigating a command-line based environment', 'Strong understanding of statistics and predictive modeling']

['', "-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.", '-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop rapid prototypes, design requirements for and extend data collection efforts with privacy in mind.\xa0', '-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience supporting technical support team with data-driven insights', 'Responsibilities:', '-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Strong math, statistics, signal processing, or time-series data manipulation background', 'As a Machine Learning Engineer / Data Scientist, you will be at the heart of Miku’s engineering process providing our customers with the most accurate and representative data insights available.\xa0 We are focused on solving the difficult problem of picking out human vital signs in diverse and uncontrolled environments at scale, and providing our customers with useful insights.', '-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Superb communicator', 'Preferred qualifications:', '-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience providing data analytics and insights for consumer or healthcare facing products', '\xa0', '-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 5 years developing scalable customer facing algorithms in the cloud, providing customers with vital data insights', '-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Extend and improve algorithm unit testing, regression testing, and integration testing with a Test-Driven Development mentality.\xa0 Develop metrics for tracking performance, ready to present algorithm analyses such as PD, FAR, Confusion Matrix, ROC, etc.', '-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Support technical support team with data-driven insights', '-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Design and build tooling and infrastructure to help engineering teams analyze data and system performance', 'Miku is a tech company empowering people to live better through higher awareness. Our flagship product, the Miku Smart Baby Monitor, captures and analyzes breathing, sound, and sleep patterns in real time with no wires or wearables, using proprietary SensorFusion technology. With a Miku monitor, stream HD video and audio, track temperature and humidity levels, play custom MikuMusic sleep sounds and lullabies, and receive sleep reports and expert health tips through the Android and iOS-compatible app. A local processor, crypto chip technology, and custom dual Ole Wolff speakers are just some of the unique features packed in our Miku monitor.', '-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Working knowledge of Python 3.x including numpy, pandas, keras, AWS Sagemaker', '-\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Extend and improve data insights models for existing and new products, develop rapid prototypes, integrate into existing systems', 'Minimum qualifications:']

['', 'What You Will Need', 'Build new AI Products, and evaluate and improve BlackRock’s products.', 'Background in basic mathematical and statistical principles such as regression, probability distributions, multi-variate calculus, matrix algebra.', 'Build and prototype analysis and data pipelines iteratively that will lead to insights at scale. Develop holistic understanding of BlackRock data structures and metrics, advocating for changes to promote new product features or sales opportunities within the team.', 'Work closely with data engineering and infrastructure to build out end to end solutions.', 'Our Benefits', 'About BlackRock', 'Build new AI Products, and evaluate and improve BlackRock’s products.You will work with a multi-discipline, multi-region team of outstanding data scientists, engineers, and investment professionals on a corporate-wide set of client, investor, and operational problems. This can include problems in a multitude of areas including but not limited to: NLP such as extracting and correlating n-grams from unstructured text to drive contextual understanding in different business applications across the firm, Graph Analysis for path generation for data lineage/provenance, ontological development, or network analytics, Statistical analysis to generate predictive models in sales and marketing applications and Alpha generation: extracting signals from data sets that provide investment opportunities to business.Work closely with data engineering and infrastructure to build out end to end solutions.Work with large sophisticated data sets. Seek novel investment, client, or operational analysis problems by applying analytical methods.In conjunction with the team, conduct end to end analysis that consists of gathering, requirements specification, processing, analysis, algorithms, builds, ongoing results, and presentations for specific projects. ['', 'Making long-term data science roadmap decisions like how machine learning and data science iteration should be done at PlaidUtilizing features of billions of transactions to help loan applicants access capital for personal and small-business loans, help fintech developers protect against payments fraud, and help consumers improve the safety and security of their financial accounts.Exploring new ways we can better equip users and clients with insights about spending, saving, and investingMentoring other data scientists and establishing a culture of modeling excellenceChampioning a data-first approach toward decision-making across the entire organization', "We're guided by our principles, including impact, growing together, embracing openness and positivity, and inventing tomorrow; we're looking for people motivated by those same principles.", 'Ability to code and iterate independently on top of data infrastructure tools like Python,\xa0 Spark, Jupyter notebooks, standard ML libraries, etc', 'Championing a data-first approach toward decision-making across the entire organization', 'Strong product intuition and excitement to work fast and iteratively', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Mentoring other data scientists and establishing a culture of modeling excellence', "You’ll be a data scientist embedded on the Financial Identity Team (FIT). When an individual applies for a loan, the lender needs to verify that a person’s income, which oftentimes requires a manual review step adding in an extra burdensome step.\xa0 FIT is working closely with lenders to automate this process by verifying the person's income based on information submitted and their bank transaction information, allowing their income to quickly be verified.\xa0 As a data scientist on FIT, you’ll be building models that help improve this verification process.", 'What excites us', 'Exploring new ways we can better equip users and clients with insights about spending, saving, and investing', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, Economics, or a closely related field", "5+ years of industry experience developing machine learning models from inception to business impact. Proven ability to tailor your solutions to business problems in a cross functional teamDeep understanding of modern machine learning techniques and their mathematical models, such as classification, clustering, optimization, deep neural network and natural language processingAbility to code and iterate independently on top of data infrastructure tools like Python,\xa0 Spark, Jupyter notebooks, standard ML libraries, etcStrong product intuition and excitement to work fast and iterativelyData analytics and data engineering experience is a plusBachelor's degree or equivalent work experience in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, Economics, or a closely related field", 'Making long-term data science roadmap decisions like how machine learning and data science iteration should be done at Plaid', "Plaid’s data science team is building models that improve how millions of users understand and grow their financial lives. We're looking for data scientists with experience applying state-of-the-art machine learning and modeling techniques -- including natural language processing, anomaly detection, optimization, and time series forecasting -- toward different product areas. We value not only technical know-how, but also creativity, user empathy, and teamwork.", 'Deep understanding of modern machine learning techniques and their mathematical models, such as classification, clustering, optimization, deep neural network and natural language processing', 'Data analytics and data engineering experience is a plus', 'We believe that the way consumers and businesses interact with their finances will drastically improve in the next few years. Our goal is to build the tools and infrastructure for developers to create this next generation of financial services applications. Today, thousands of companies such as Acorns, Stripe, and Venmo rely on Plaid to integrate with banks and the financial system. Plaid’s infrastructure handles millions of requests per day and thousands of bank integrations. We pride ourselves on maintaining a robust API to support the developers who depend on us and the millions of consumers who use their\xa0 apps.\xa0', '5+ years of industry experience developing machine learning models from inception to business impact. Proven ability to tailor your solutions to business problems in a cross functional team', 'What excites you', 'Utilizing features of billions of transactions to help loan applicants access capital for personal and small-business loans, help fintech developers protect against payments fraud, and help consumers improve the safety and security of their financial accounts.']

At least 0-3 years of prior professional experience is highly desired.', 'HERE’S WHAT YOU’LL DO (RESPONSIBILITIES)\xa0', 'At Momentum Worldwide, we value diversity and the uniqueness of all people. We thrive in an inclusive environment, and we recruit, hire and promote without regard to race, gender, age, color, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, ethnic or national origin, citizenship, religion, sexual preference, military or veteran status, marital status, family status, physical or mental disability – or any other legally protected categories as set forth in the applicable state, federal or local laws. And how we do it is with genius, dedication, strategic thinking and working together as one fearless, handsome troop. We work too smart not to make the world better. And we work too well not to continually push for more. Think on all that, too.', 'Experienced in strategic thinking and ability to see, articulate and drive to the big picture', 'At Momentum we believe in delivering solutions to our clients that are anchored in insights and analytics. Data Scientists are a key component of the Analytics team.\xa0From creating proprietary measurement tools, to structuring and analyzing data, implementing and interpreting models that feed business-improving insights, and putting it all together into presentations that bring the story to life for our clients; Data Scientists work closely with the rest of the team to help execute the broader vision for their account, and to continually evolve our Data Science solutions.', '0-3 years work experience in quantitative analysis with proven results in leveraging customer/transaction to address business objectives', 'Bachelors Degree required, preferably in a STEM field, or equivalent work experience0-3 years work experience in quantitative analysis with proven results in leveraging customer/transaction to address business objectivesPrior agency experience a plus but not requiredHighly proficient in at least one popular programming language used for Machine Learning, such as Python or RPrior agency experience strongly desiredStrong knowledge of Relational Databases and SQL programmingSolid understanding of mathematical modeling, probability and statistics, and the design and simulation of stochastic systems.Familiarity with the mathematics behind important statistical learning algorithms such as ARIMA, Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, Centroid-based and Hierarchical Clustering, Principal Component Analysis (PCA), Decision Trees/Random Forest, Bayesian Inference, Markov Chain Monte-Carlo (MCMC)Familiarity with common advanced marketing analytics solutions such as Marketing Mix Modeling (MMM), Multi-touch Attribution (MTA), and Dynamic Content Optimization (DCO)Strong communication skills. Ability to speak and write professionally. Ability and comfort with presenting work by phone or within small groups.World-class customer service skills. Ability to service clients, partners and internal stakeholders by understanding their needs, translating those needs into creative solutions, and delivering on those solutions with diligence and a sense of urgencyMust be familiar with the capabilities and mechanics of a broad range of marketing measurements and technologies such as Ad Servers, DSP, DMPs, CRMs, and Syndicated ResearchExceptional relationship and influencing skillsExperienced in strategic thinking and ability to see, articulate and drive to the big picturePassion and solution orientated approach to problem solvingExceptional verbal & written communication skills and adept at communicating effectively across all levelsHighly developed presentation and delivery skillsAbility to perform well in fast changing environments.Exceptional client management skills', 'Design, estimate, tune, score and maintain advanced statistical and mathematical models (e.g. classification, numeric forecasts, customer segmentation, customer propensity, attribution, etc.)', 'Prior agency experience a plus but not required', 'Because the idea that a brand’s action is more important than its rhetoric is the key to our entire approach. It is all about the experience and we can—hands down, bar- none—create that better than anyone else. That’s not jargon or ego—it’s truth.']

We hire talented people (thinkers, doers, dreamers, makers), challenge them and give them every opportunity to grow.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Consulting skills – can explore business view and work with them to develop mutually owned solution; can solve problems in complex situations using creative and conceptual reasoning.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working with and managing teams in product development', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0field.', 'As a Data Scientist, Advanced Analytics you will work with multiple business arms at Horizon Media to integrate Data Science into easy to use products for users buying, planning and analyzing media.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Establish and maintain excellent working relationship with key functional areas, as well as HMI Analytics and other stakeholders throughout Horizon.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to perform advanced data visualization using tools such as D3.JS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exposure to large data sets (“big data”) and analysis thereof\xa0a major plus.', '\xa0', 'Certificates, Licenses and Registrations', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bring an “outside in perspective” to analytic development; explore, identify and assess external best practices - and translate to the relevant application internally.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with relational databases like PostgreSQL and MySQL as well as document-oriented databases such as MongoDB', 'At Horizon, we understand the value that different perspectives can bring to our clients and culture, so we strive for an environment where our employees feel welcomed, safe and empowered. We value YOU and believe that your authentic voice and unique perspective allows us to create a more rewarding culture, and experience, together.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Analytical mindset with knowledge and passion for media, data and technology.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Optimize resource management while developing a high performance team with diverse analytic and programming capabilities.', 'Preferred Skills & Experience', '70% Development and Enhancement of data and analytics capabilities', 'Certificates, Licenses and Registrations ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in fast-paced environment, possessing the ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously.', 'What You’ll Do', 'We are looking for someone who is intellectually curious with the drive and experience to identify, frame and solve business problems.\xa0They must be a critical thinker who can provide creative strategic solutions and who can follow-through with flawless execution.\xa0Critical to the role is the ability to provide thought leadership\xa0that can drive our capabilities through analytic innovations.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Comfortable in dealing with ambiguity\xa0and managing change, plus the capacity to move through road-blocks with enthusiasm and\xa0alacrity.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep expertise in advertising platforms and/or the ad tech industry preferred.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Business acumen – understands the strategic levers of the business and how analytics is a catalyst for decision making.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa00-2 years of experience\xa0required in the Advanced Analytics realm, preferably in media or an adjacent', 'Horizon Media', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Create scripts utilizing machine learning to analyze data.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Use automation and technology to increase efficiency and to provide the infrastructure to scale.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrated ability to be creative; to put structure around vague and unstructured requests/discussions.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong understanding of machine learning and the ability to implement classification, clustering, regression and dimensionality reduction algorithms', 'Supervisory Responsibilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Expert knowledge in an analytic and programming language such as Python, R, or a similar language', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent problem solving skills and a dogged determination to work an issue through to its satisfying conclusion are both a must.', 'You are a clear and persuasive communicator who thrives in a highly collaborative team environment and has the ability to guide solutions for ever-evolving real-time problem sets.\xa0Above all, the Data Scientist, Advanced Analytics must be highly driven with an exceptional work ethic, determination to overcome complex challenges, and must have a desire to have huge impact on the business.', '30% Cultivating and maintaining effective working relationships- internally and externally', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proactive individual with strong problem-solving skills and an entrepreneurial spirit.', 'The statements herein are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by employees and are not to be construed as an exhaustive list of responsibilities, duties and skills required of personnel so classified. Furthermore, they do not establish a contract for employment and are subject to change at the discretion of the employer.', 'Who You Are', 'N/A', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Identify and implement 3rd party data sources to improve media buying intelligence']

['', 'Bachelors or advanced degree in data science, statistics, computer science or a related quantitative discipline.', 'Partner with the other food team members, data scientists, product team staff, and engineers to develop tools, processes, and models to enhance our food data and metadata.This may include:Increase data volume: assessing data and APIs from potential vendors, identify and develop processes or models to source, clean, normalize, dedupe, map and tag new data (e.g. via vendors, OCR, NLP, search)Enhance data quality: perform exploratory analysis on our data, quantify data quality issues, cross validate data quality among sources, and develop tools, models, and processes to improve metrics.Enhance our global food ontology by programmatically sourcing data, metadata, and synonyms, develop models and tools to map the world’s ingredients, foods, and dishes to our concepts.Enhance and develop approaches (such as NLP, clustering, embedding) to associate high quality metadata such as dietary and allergen tags to our foods.Partner with other data scientists to develop models, such as embeddings or natural language processes, to create new or enhance existing food-data related data products.Partner with the search team to improve member food search experience.Motivate and mentor other data scientists to grow their skills and careers.', '1+ years of experience building and implementing machine-learned models in industry or academia. Bonus points for experience in the food data space.', 'Partner with other data scientists to develop models, such as embeddings or natural language processes, to create new or enhance existing food-data related data products.', 'Expert knowledge of Python / R and SQL, or similar industry standard tools used for large-scale data analysis and modeling.', 'Increase data volume: assessing data and APIs from potential vendors, identify and develop processes or models to source, clean, normalize, dedupe, map and tag new data (e.g. via vendors, OCR, NLP, search)', 'Self-motivated, results oriented, enthusiastic, and a creative thinker.', 'Enhance data quality: perform exploratory analysis on our data, quantify data quality issues, cross validate data quality among sources, and develop tools, models, and processes to improve metrics.', 'Enhance our global food ontology by programmatically sourcing data, metadata, and synonyms, develop models and tools to map the world’s ingredients, foods, and dishes to our concepts.', 'Recent experience with a digital company is a plus.', 'Some knowledge of production software best practices: git, CI/CD, linting, and testing.', 'Experience with cloud data warehouse (BigQuery, Snowflake), Google Cloud or AWS Platform (GKE, S3, Dataflow, Beam, Tensorflow) and other big data technologies a plus.', 'Motivate and mentor other data scientists to grow their skills and careers.', 'Partner with the other food team members, data scientists, product team staff, and engineers to develop tools, processes, and models to enhance our food data and metadata.', 'Enhance and develop approaches (such as NLP, clustering, embedding) to associate high quality metadata such as dietary and allergen tags to our foods.', 'This may include:', 'Some familiarity with application infrastructure: database technologies, containerization, and API standards. Bonus points for data visualization (such as D3, streamlit, flask)', 'Good communication and presentation skills. Ability to synthesize, summarize, and share issues, examples, and progress to a variety of technical and non technical stakeholders and partners.', 'Experience with advanced modeling techniques, such as predictive modeling, matrix factorization, time series analysis, classifiers, and ensemble methods. Bonus points for natural language processing.', '1+ years of experience building and implementing machine-learned models in industry or academia. Bonus points for experience in the food data space.Bachelors or advanced degree in data science, statistics, computer science or a related quantitative discipline.Experience with advanced modeling techniques, such as predictive modeling, matrix factorization, time series analysis, classifiers, and ensemble methods. Bonus points for natural language processing.Good communication and presentation skills. Ability to synthesize, summarize, and share issues, examples, and progress to a variety of technical and non technical stakeholders and partners.Expert knowledge of Python / R and SQL, or similar industry standard tools used for large-scale data analysis and modeling.Some knowledge of production software best practices: git, CI/CD, linting, and testing.Some familiarity with application infrastructure: database technologies, containerization, and API standards. Bonus points for data visualization (such as D3, streamlit, flask)Experience with cloud data warehouse (BigQuery, Snowflake), Google Cloud or AWS Platform (GKE, S3, Dataflow, Beam, Tensorflow) and other big data technologies a plus.Recent experience with a digital company is a plus.Self-motivated, results oriented, enthusiastic, and a creative thinker.', 'Partner with the search team to improve member food search experience.']

', ' Keep abreast of the latest developments in the Data Science field by continuous learning and proactively champion promising new methods relevant to the problems at hand. \xa0', ' Experience in B2B software industry preferred', 'Job Description', ' Understand new data sources and process pipelines, and catalog/document them.\xa0 Display drive and curiosity to understand the business process to its core.\xa0 Network with domain experts to better understand the business mechanics that generated the data. ', ' NOTE **This is NOT an intern level role**']

Equal Opportunity Employer.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Cleanse data', 'At SuperATV we are working to WOW our customers with innovative, race-tested products and world-class customer service. Currently, we have an opportunity for a Data Scientist to join our team. Data Science, Big Data, Data Engineer.\xa0These all describe the vast amount of data that is available to eCommerce companies today.\xa0SuperATV is looking for an individual that wants to be a part of a ground-up strategy in developing and optimizing the vast amount of data the company has collected so that we can make smarter decisions to provide an overall better customer experience.\xa0This includes building a data warehouse from disjointed data sources, applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high-quality predictive models for product recommendation engines and customer-centric data segmentation. It is not uncommon for companies to grapple with how to make sense of the massive amount of disparate data that it has collected.\xa0That is why this role will be integral is working with the leadership team to make data-driven decisions to impact overall business performance.\xa0The primary job of the role will be to\xa0bring that data together, develop models that can answer the questions the company is asking, and evaluate and recommend the resources and technology needed to accomplish the tasks at hand. This is a fantastic opportunity to engage in a positive and creative work environment that offers excellent benefits and flexible schedules such as the ability to work remotely.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop a data warehouse strategy to pull in disparate systems', 'Required Knowledge', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Good applied statistics skills, such as distributions, statistical testing, regression, etc.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Make recommendations to leadership team based on data-driven decisions']

job_title: Senior Data Scientist, location Enfield, USA or London, UK
job_text: ['', ' Stakeholder management skills', ' Mathematical modelling Apply models that explain robustly relationships in data, both historical and forward looking. Have the ability to identify pros and cons of different alternatives, and make decisions based on business question.', ' Track record in application of a wide range of mathematical models that can be applied for both diagnosing past and predicting future for a combination of metrics', ' End-to-end ownership of projects Responsible for taking a loosely formed brief and delivering value to internal partners.', ' Experience in completing data science projects from end to end', ' Expertise in many data science areas, including practical implementation of Machine Learning models, with specific applications in Marketing Analytics', ' Advantage experience with working in agile environments (e.g. SCRUM teams)', ' Fluent in English both written and spoken', ' Proven experience in Promotional Effectiveness Modelling is a strong plus', ' Maintenance Supervise and challenge design and implementation of error handling and testing of analytics code.', ' Experience with the Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Python, RStudio, Shiny', ' Able to translate technical content to business audiences in a way that delivers the most value', ' BSc or MSc degree with emphasis on one or more of the following data science, economics, econometrics, computer science, computer engineering, statistics, mathematics or equivalent quantitative subject area (advantage PhD studies)', ' Data exploration Be able to construct useful and measurable metrics, organize data incl. wrangling, and ensure quality and accuracy of input data into models.']

['', "Familiarity with Good Documentation Practices and other GXP's preferred", 'Eurofins Scientific is an international life sciences company, providing a unique range of analytical testing services to clients across multiple industries, to make life and our environment safer, healthier and more sustainable. ', 'Help with template lock outs, moving old versions and checking user roles', 'Company Description', 'Excellent full time benefits including comprehensive medical coverage, dental, and vision optionsLife and disability insurance401(k) with company matchPaid vacation and holidays', 'Experience working with Softmax software version 7 at “Administrator” level preferenceHelp with template lock outs, moving old versions and checking user roles', 'Job Description', 'Eurofins is a M/F, Disabled, and Veteran Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer.', 'total revenues of EUR € 4.56 billion, and has been among the best performing stocks in Europe over the past 20 years. ', 'In over just 30 years, Eurofins has grown from one laboratory in Nantes, France to over 47,000 staff across a network of more than 900 independent companies in over 50 countries and operating more than 800 laboratories. Eurofins offers a portfolio of over 200,000 analytical methods to evaluate the safety, identity, composition, authenticity, origin, traceability and purity of biological substances and products, as well as providing innovative clinical diagnostic testing services, as one of the leading global emerging players in specialised clinical diagnostics testing. ['', 'Applicants are required to be eligible to lawfully work in the U.S. immediately; employer will not sponsor applicants for U.S. work authorization (e.g. H-1B Visa) for this opportunity. Through this role, you will work to increase the use of analytics for decision making across the company.Being part of our data science team will help facilitate your professional growth across multiple development areas. First, you will strengthen your communication skills through interactions with business partners that require you to articulate statistical concepts in a non-technical way. Additionally, the variety of projects that you work on will allow you to refine your knowledge for supervised and unsupervised learning techniques. Exercise sound judgment to diagnose and resolve problems within an area of expertise.Experience with SQL and with Python, R, or SAS. Familiarity with AWS. Familiarity with Linux. ['', 'We are looking for an exceptional deep learning data scientist join our exceptional team. We have a fast-paced, high-performance, and result-oriented culture, looking for candidates hungry for learning. The preferred candidate will bring relevant experience, entrepreneurial drive, and a passion for advancing our vision.', 'Proficiency in Python, and familiarity with deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch,) and deep learning hardware (CPU, GPU, multi-node)', 'Experience with network-based machine learning algorithms is preferred, as well as traditional machine learning techniques and statistical methods', 'Why you should join ReviveMed', 'Opportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expands', 'We are an award-winning enthusiastic team, passionate about innovative, data-driven approaches to bring the right therapeutics for the right patients, and ultimately save millions of lives.', 'Required Qualifications', 'The Company', 'An opportunity to learn about the applications of advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to drug discovery and development from the beginning', 'Competitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share options', 'Involvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clients', '\xa0', 'Strong understanding of the underlying math and learning concepts in these algorithms', 'ReviveMed is an MIT spinout, artificial intelligence (AI)-driven drug discovery platform by uniquely leveraging data from small molecules or metabolites in the human body. Located in the heart of biotech innovation in Cambridge, ReviveMed uniquely overcomes the difficulties of identifying a large set of metabolites for each patient, based on technology that our team developed at MIT and published in Nature Methods. Our AI platform further combines the data from small molecules with other molecular data and translates these data into novel therapeutic insights for drug discovery. Currently, ReviveMed is collaborating with tier-one pharmaceutical companies and pursuing internal drug discovery, initially focused on metabolic diseases, including non-alcoholic fatty liver.', 'An opportunity to learn about the applications of advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to drug discovery and development from the beginningOpportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expandsInvolvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clientsCompetitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share optionsMaking an impact on the world with every line of code', 'Extensive experience in leveraging Deep Learning (ANN, CNN, RNN, Auto-encoders, GAN, etc.)', 'Making an impact on the world with every line of code', 'PhD or MS degree in Computer Science or related fields; 2-5 years of work experience preferred, but we will consider strong candidates with less experienceExtensive experience in leveraging Deep Learning (ANN, CNN, RNN, Auto-encoders, GAN, etc.)Strong understanding of the underlying math and learning concepts in these algorithmsProficiency in Python, and familiarity with deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch,) and deep learning hardware (CPU, GPU, multi-node)Self-motivated, highly disciplined, passionate about learning, and making a change in the worldExperience with network-based machine learning algorithms is preferred, as well as traditional machine learning techniques and statistical methods', 'PhD or MS degree in Computer Science or related fields; 2-5 years of work experience preferred, but we will consider strong candidates with less experience', 'Self-motivated, highly disciplined, passionate about learning, and making a change in the world', 'The Role']

['', "A master's degree from an accredited college or university with specialization in an appropriate field of physical, biological, environmental or social science and three years of responsible full-time research experience in the appropriate field of specialization; or", 'A doctorate degree from an accredited college or university with specialization in an appropriate field of physical, biological, environmental or social science and one year of full-time experience in a responsible supervisory, administrative or research capacity in the appropriate field of specialization; or', 'Education and/or experience which is equivalent to "1" or "2" above. However, all candidates must have at least a master\'s degree in an appropriate field of specialization and at least two years of experience described in "2" above. Two years as a City Research Scientist Level I can be substituted for the experience required in "1" and "2" above. NOTE: Probationary Period Appointments to this position are subject to a minimum probationary period of one year. Preferred Skills Close familiarity with federal labor market data (e.g., CPS, ACS, QCEW). Excellent econometric skills, including regression analysis using common statistical packages (e.g., R, Stata). Prior experience with survey and experimental design. Subject matter expertise in minimum labor standards research and policy. High level of organization, including ability to ensure findings are reproducible and analytical choices are transparent and well-supported. Ability to communicate technical concepts and results to non-technical audiences. Graduate degree in Economics, though candidates with a quantitative focus in adjacent disciplines will also be considered (e.g., Public Policy, Urban Planning, Industrial Relations, Sociology). To For Non-City/External Candidates: Visit the External Applicant NYC Careers site and type Consumer Affairs on the search line. Then locate the Job ID number. For Current City Employees: Visit Employee Self Service (ESS) to view and click on Recruiting Activities, Careers, and search by Job ID number. A RESUME AND COVER LETTER ARE REQUIRED. PLEASE INDICATE IN YOUR COVER LETTER HOW YOU HEARD ABOUT THIS POSITION. INCOMPLETE APPLICATIONS WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED. NO PHONE CALLS, FAXES, E-MAILS OR PERSONAL INQUIRIES PERMITTED. NOTE: ONLY THOSE CANDIDATES UNDER CONSIDERATION WILL BE CONTACTED. Appointments are subject to Office of Management and Budget (OMB) approval. 55-a Candidates: NYC Department of Consumer Affairs is committed to recruiting and retaining a diverse and culturally responsive workforce. We strongly encourage 55-A candidates to apply to our positions in order to be given the opportunity. LOAN FORGIVENESS: The federal government provides student loan forgiveness through its Public Service Loan Forgiveness Program (PSLF) to all qualifying public service employees. Working with DCA qualifies you as a public service employee and you may be able to take advantage of this program while working full-time and meeting the program\'s other requirements. Please visit the Public Service Loan Forgiveness Program site to view the eligibility requirements:We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations that enable people with disabilities to enjoy equal benefits and privileges of employment as are enjoyed by others. If you are contacted to attend an interview for one of our open vacancies and would like to request an accommodation for that date, please send an email to . Residency Requirement New York City residency is generally required within 90 days of appointment. However, City Employees in certain titles who have worked for the City for 2 continuous years may also be eligible to reside in Nassau, Suffolk, Putnam, Westchester, Rockland, or Orange County. To determine if the residency requirement applies to you, please discuss with the agency representative at the time of interview. POSTING DATE 03/01/2021 POST UNTIL 04/30/2021 The City of New York is an Equal Opportunity Employer', "Reporting to the OLPS Research Director, the Data Scientist will work closely with the Office's investigation and litigation teams to develop and implement strategies for the discovery, collection, and analysis of employer data relating to compliance with city workplace laws. Working on the Office's most complex cases, the Data Scientist will help collect and use this data to identify violations of NYC workplace laws, assess the validity of claims by employers and workers, calculate employee relief and civil penalties, and guide investigators in the collection of testimonial evidence and other documentation. The Data Scientist will also contribute to OLPS' research and policy work, focusing on how law, policy, and agency enforcement activities can be used to raise labor standards for low-wage and other vulnerable workers. Research may include a mix of original data collection (e.g., surveys, field experiments) and secondary data analysis, drawing on both descriptive and modern econometric methods. Responsibilities include: Working with investigators and attorneys on enforcement actions requesting data relevant to employers' compliance with NYC workplace laws. Helping to design data strategies and tools for analyzing compliance with the new Wrongful Discharge Law. Communicating with employers' counsel and technical staff to ensure delivery of responsive data, along with all information necessary for its interpretation. Using appropriate data analysis tools to describe employer practices, identify key witnesses, and calculate damages. Developing data analysis tools for use by investigators and attorneys, training investigators and attorneys in their use, and supervising their application. Assessing all aspects of how OLPS uses data in its investigations and litigation and recommending and implementing improvements. Developing close familiarity with the design and use of common business process applications used by employers to track employee schedules, time worked, and payroll. Recommending changes to laws, rules, and agency guidance to the extent they may relate to any of the functions described above. Assisting with other aspects of the OLPS research team's work, including analyses of labor market data or the Office's internal administrative data. Evaluating the impacts of recent and potential policy changes, including but not limited to those implemented by the New York City government. Modeling the prospective impacts of proposals originating from OLPS, the Mayor's Office, or City Council. Advising on policy changes to raise labor standards and expand access to employment. Coordinating the work of City contractors, academic researchers, or other partners engaged in any of the above. Minimum Qual Requirements", "For Assignment Level I (only physical, biological and environmental sciences and public health) A master's degree from an accredited college or university with a specialization in an appropriate field of physical, biological or environmental science or in public health. To be appointed to Assignment Level II and above, candidates must have:"]

['', 'Ability to write sophisticated SQL queries', 'Skills', 'Apply and integrate statistical, mathematical, data mining, predictive modeling and business analysis skills and techniques to discover and identify new insights, advise on turning new insights into impactful opportunities and outcomes, and providing the tracking and measurement of results.', 'Position:', 'It would be useful for interested parties to have as much of the following experience as possible: Machine learning experience, experience with distributed databases and query languages like Hive or Spark, programming experience with a scripting language such as Python, Java, or Ruby.', 'At Northwestern Mutual, we are strong, innovative and growing. We invest in our people. We care and make a positive difference. On a typical assignment, the actuary would be responsible for:', 'About the job: ', 'BA/BS in Actuarial Science, Mathematics or related technical discipline.', 'Company Profile:\xa0', 'Place of work: Boston / remote in US', 'Working with the analytics team to define and research answers to internal and external questions and requests', 'Proposing, defining and supporting research on new analytics ideas to increase and maximize the value added of Octo’s services for our Clients', 'Company Profile:\xa0Company Profile: Founded in 2002, Octo is today the Number 1 global provider of telematics and data analytics solutions for the auto insurance industry and, increasingly, a major player in Fleet management services, with world-class solutions to grow its core businesses – Insurtech and Intelligent Mobility – and to expand and provide innovative connected solutions in new industries and international markets. Octo’s vision is to connect the world of mobility through advanced analytics and IoT-driven services for a new era of Smart Telematics. Octo currently has 6 million connected users, holds the largest global database of telematics data, with more than 248 billion miles of driving data collected and over 464,000 crashes and insurance events analysed, and runs more than 10 car sharing services with more than 400,000 hires per month. In light of the significant Company growth planned for the next years, and based on Employees current needs perceived, Octo is re-enforcing the CHROO structure adding an HR Administration Specialist within the HR Administration Department.', 'Experience with personal lines and commercial lines.', 'Experience working with SQL.', 'Assisting with the development of required filing support and responding to questions posed by regulators during the DOI approval process', 'Strong written, oral and presentation skills wit demonstrated experience communicating information to executive management, prospects, clients and public groups.', "Participating as a subject matter expert with prospective clients.\xa0This includes, but is not limited to presenting Octo's analytical products
