['', 'Designing and building data pipelines to translate internally generated and externally sourced data into well-curated, biologically relevant datasets for machine learning.Statistical modeling to implement and evaluate experimental design strategies to optimize the BigHat platform and BigHat-produced antibodies.Designing and implementing innovative strategies to QC, represent, integrate, model, and interpret diverse datasets.Collaborating closely with BigHat wet lab, software engineering, and other team members to ensure a tight linkage between experimental and machine learning platform components.', 'Compensation', 'Designing and building data pipelines to translate internally generated and externally sourced data into well-curated, biologically relevant datasets for machine learning.', 'You have a stellar track record at top-tier institutions or companies, a strong publication record and scientific background (Ph.D. preferred or MS with 3+ years of experience), and 3+ years of developing, evaluating, and applying bioinformatics pipelines, classic statistical models (regression, ANOVA, random effects models), experimental design, and AI/ML (SVMs, deep learning); excellent communication skills; thrive in a fast-paced environment helping to launch, operate and grow a high-potential startup. Nice-to-haves include experience with phage/yeast display and NGS data, protein biophysical data, and protein structure modeling. If you love tinkering, optimizing, and diving headfirst into highly technical projects with a diverse team, then BigHat could be the right home for you.', 'Designing and implementing innovative strategies to QC, represent, integrate, model, and interpret diverse datasets.', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Compensation will include a competitive pay package, benefits, and equity commensurate with an early employee at a growth-oriented startup. We encourage applicants with diverse backgrounds to apply.', 'Statistical modeling to implement and evaluate experimental design strategies to optimize the BigHat platform and BigHat-produced antibodies.', 'About You', 'BigHat Biosciences is seeking an exceptional individual to spearhead BigHat’s bioinformatics pipelines that underlie our molecular engineering and platform capabilities.', 'Collaborating closely with BigHat wet lab, software engineering, and other team members to ensure a tight linkage between experimental and machine learning platform components.']

['Data Scientist', '', 'This is a team that specializes in calculating refund amounts for card customers when they have been inadvertently negatively impacted by a mistake or error made by the client. ', 'This role requires very data savvy individuals with a close eye for detail to ensure refunds are calculated correctly. ', 'Duration: 12 Months+ ', 'Job Description:', 'Duration:', 'It requires strong SQL, SAS, and communication skills.', 'It is a heavy data analytics role. ', 'This role requires very data savvy individuals with a close eye for detail to ensure refunds are calculated correctly. It requires strong SQL, SAS, and communication skills.', 'Job Requirements:', 'These roles would be on the Remediation Analytics team. This is a team that specializes in calculating refund amounts for card customers when they have been inadvertently negatively impacted by a mistake or error made by the client. It is a heavy data analytics role. Given the team works on issues from a variety of business areas, it requires the team to work with business partners to develop an understanding of the relevant business, the issue, and pertinent data. The team works closely with Business Risk to determine the action plan for each restitution, and the analysts in this role then use that action plan to determine the necessary refunds. ', 'Given the team works on issues from a variety of business areas, it requires the team to work with business partners to develop an understanding of the relevant business, the issue, and pertinent data. ', 'Location:', '#AF – 32401', 'These roles would be on the Remediation Analytics team. ', 'Location: RIVERWOODS, IL\xa0', 'The team works closely with Business Risk to determine the action plan for each restitution, and the analysts in this role then use that action plan to determine the necessary refunds. ']

['', 'Proficient in programming languages such as Python, Scala, Java and C.', 'Experience building and optimizing scalable data architecture.', 'Learn more at: https://neon.life/', 'As a Contract-to-Hire Data Scientist in Data / Visualization, you will be a part of the Strategy team, but working closely with the R&D team as well. You will be collaborating within the team to design architectures, processes, and visualizations around data related to artificial intelligence, but also work with R&D across product, design, infrastructure, strategy and engineering. You will have the opportunity to innovate, strategize, build prototypes of user-facing products, and ship these features to millions of people. Above all, you will be working outside your comfort zone while making an impact and having fun.', 'Pursuing or have completed BS, MS in electrical engineering, computer science, mathematics or related field.', 'Familiar with machine learning tools such as Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, SciKit-Learn or statistical modeling tools such R.', 'Deep understanding of statistical modeling and machine learning concepts, and a track record of solving problems with these methods.', 'Strong mathematical and analytical problem-solving ability.', 'The Strategy Team is one of the core pillars of the company, responsible for overall growth and business planning. In addition, the Strategy Team also leads marketing, partnership, corporate finance, and product management. The Strategy Team works very closely on a day-to-day basis with the executive leadership of STAR Labs.\xa0This role is primarily focused on activities within product management.', 'Pursuing or have completed BS, MS in electrical engineering, computer science, mathematics or related field.Proficient in programming languages such as Python, Scala, Java and C.Deep understanding of statistical modeling and machine learning concepts, and a track record of solving problems with these methods.Familiar with machine learning tools such as Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, SciKit-Learn or statistical modeling tools such R.Experience building and optimizing scalable data architecture.Degree in graphic design or related studies preferred.Strong mathematical and analytical problem-solving ability.', 'Degree in graphic design or related studies preferred.']

With good knowledge of data distributions, generate synthetic datasets under highly organized and structured conditions. Apply the scientific method in designing studies to analyze and characterize the performance of our proprietary patten-based model. ['', 'This position is within the data science team, focusing on deriving insights from metabolomics, genomics, microbiome, and clinical data, in collaboration with chemists, biologists, clinicians within and outside of the company. We develop algorithms and practice cutting-edge data engineering, statistical analytics, and machine learning techniques to derive biological discoveries and clinical insights with rigor. We are looking for an experienced biological data scientist in statistical inference, machine learning, and interested in biology and healthcare to bring his/her skills to our team. This is a great opportunity to tackle a diverse set of problems while shaping the future of life science.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Communicate data insights with collaborators and clients with clarity', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Rigorous statistical intuition and deep understanding of core statistical principles', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep knowledge and experience with statistical inference and machine learning on biological omis and human clinical dataset', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proficiency with R, python, Bash', 'Role', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate with scientists and clinicians to investigate scientific and medical problems with rigorous analyses and critical thinking', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with database query language (e.g. SQL) and cloud computing (e.g. AWS)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Apply and develop machine learning methods to produce novel and high-confidence insights with human biological data', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Apply statistical and machine learning methods to human genomics, metabolomics, microbiome, and clinical data', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Organized and driven, critical thinker', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0MS or PhD in statistics, computational biology, bioinformatics, genetics, physics, or engineering', 'Responsibilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Track record of high-quality projects or publications', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Curious and eager to learn, self-motivated, great communicator, thriving in a dynamic and intellectually challenging environment', 'Qualifications', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent oral and written communication skills', 'Fast growing biotech startup aims to accelerate drug development and transform personalized medicine, with multifaceted human health and omics data in conjunction with state-of-the-art mass spectrometry technology. We are a team of passionate scientists, clinicians, and engineers with expertise in various disciplines. We work together in a highly collaborative environment, committed to make innovations with scientific rigor. This position offers exciting opportunity in applying data science and bioinformatics for drug development and health intelligence, as well as exposure to business development. We emphasize growth within the company and offer a flexible work environment with the opportunity to learn from top-tier thinkers and experts.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Publicize research discoveries with presentations and publications']

Knowledge of Apache-based open source technologies such as Storm, Cassandra, Ruby, etc. a plus', 'Attention to detail and time management delivering high-quality work for multiple projects across several engagements while meeting deadlines', 'At Acxiom, our vision is to transform data into value for everyone. Our data products and analytical services enable marketers to recognize, better understand and then deliver highly applicable messages to consumers across any available channel. The Audience Solutions division is responsible for enabling true people-based marketing with identity resolution and rich descriptive and predictive audience segmentation. We are seeking an experienced Data Scientist with a versatile skill set to undertake data science supporting the development of next-generation products for Acxiom’s business.  ', 'Balances desire for quantitative rigor with realities of inconsistent business data', 'Experience with applying statistics and data science tools on large datasets', 'Extensive experience with data preparation (normalization, scaling, etc.) for modeling', 'Collaborate with other data scientists and team leads to define project requirements including data sources, algorithms, and implementation', 'Work with Product and Engineering teams to transition development projects to production systems', 'Exposure to Spark/ PySpark systems in a distributed computing environment', 'Apply state-of-the-art algorithms relying on knowledge of statistical modeling, machine learning, and optimization to develop new data products or improve the performance/quality of existing products', "Bachelor's Degree in a quantitative field (Data Science, Statistics, Math) or related degree programs and 5+ years of relevant work experience OR Master's Degree in a quantitative field and 3+ years of relevant work experience", 'This role can be home-based in the US.', 'Build expert knowledge of the various data sources brought together for audience segmentation solutions – survey/panel data, 3rd-party data (demographics, psychographics, lifestyle segments), media content activity (TV, Digital, Mobile), and product purchase or transaction data']

job_title: Data Scientist - NLP and Computer Vision
job_text: ['', 'Follow the best practices of software development life cycle and produce high quality software systems.', 'Research and develop the natural language processing algorithms to recognize speech and handwritings of patients from certain clinical conditions.', 'Requirements:', 'Proficient in Python and relevant to data science packages and tools, including data visualization', ' PhD/MS in Biomedical Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or relevant discipline or research experience with strong problem-solving skills Hands on experience in Text Analytics, NLP modeling, and object tracking, machine learning based processing from the creation of the dataset to the final model in production Knowledge of state-of-the-art NLP and computer vision models including but not limited to BART, BERT, GoogleNet, ResNet, Fast-RCNN Expertise in building high-quality ML and DL methods including LSTM, GRU, CNN, and CNN-LSTM modeling techniques Proficient in Python and relevant to data science packages and tools, including data visualization Prior experience working with health data is a plus Experience with good software development practices and familiar with version control tools such as git or bitbucket Excellent written and verbal communication skills Good track record with IP and or publications', 'Prior experience working with health data is a plus', 'Build NLP and computer vision systems according to the use-cases, interfaces and requirements.', 'PhD/MS in Biomedical Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or relevant discipline or research experience with strong problem-solving skills', 'Good track record with IP and or publications', 'Experience with good software development practices and familiar with version control tools such as git or bitbucket', 'Prepare technical and validation reports for the algorithm designs & analytic solutions, implementations, and performances.', 'Hands on experience in Text Analytics, NLP modeling, and object tracking, machine learning based processing from the creation of the dataset to the final model in production', 'Biofourmis is a digital therapeutics company that pioneered and is the leader in Personalized Predictive Care. Our disruptive turnkey technology uses advanced clinical grade wearable sensors to continuously monitor bio vitals and process them using our patented and FDA approved AI/ML algorithms to predict changes in physiology that are co-related to medical and disease events in the cardiac, oncology, respiratory, and other therapeutic areas.', 'Demonstrate and present to the cross functional teams and the management.', 'Responsibilities ', "Contribute to the company's intellectual property and publications.", " Research and develop the natural language processing algorithms to recognize speech and handwritings of patients from certain clinical conditions. Research and develop the medical computer vision algorithms to recognize objects in images and videos and allow tracking of specific features of objects. Formulate experiments, acquire and simulate appropriate datasets for learning. Build NLP and computer vision systems according to the use-cases, interfaces and requirements. Follow the best practices of software development life cycle and produce high quality software systems. Create reference benchmarks and processes to select appropriate models, libraries and tools, and evaluate performance of algorithms using appropriate statistical methods. Iterate and improve the model performances using appropriate transfer learning techniques Prepare technical and validation reports for the algorithm designs & analytic solutions, implementations, and performances. Demonstrate and present to the cross functional teams and the management. Contribute to the company's intellectual property and publications. ['', '● Assist in the building of a world-class Data Science team', 'Core Responsibilities', '● Proven experience in data warehousing technologies such as BigQuery, Snowflake, Redshift, ETL/ELT tools', '● Research and recommending new technologies and processes', 'Essential Attributes ', '● Proven experience leading teams to build complex systems', 'Building an industry takes commitment, hard work, and a willingness to work on the messy details. That is where we see our most valuable contribution. Ampion’s platform enables the clean energy revolution by connecting consumers and clean energy providers. We enable consumers to purchase low cost green energy, while providing the customers and revenue for the industry to thrive. ', '● Hands on experience with programming languages such as python, javascript/node/react, golang, ruby', '● Become the subject matter expert for Data Science/Analytics providing insights based on the data and advice to other team members on how to best leverage the data and insights ', 'Ampion’s software is a critical differentiator for the company and what allows us to scale efficiently. We deal with lots of different data - from website, ad, search and social data to utility usage and billing and crediting data, to community distributed generation meter data. The Data Scientist will assist Ampion in developing the technology to turn this data into meaningful, actionable insights. ', '● Provide support for any production issues related to data models / pipelines ', 'The Data Scientist responsibilities include working closely with our Data Architect and Engineers and other members of the technology team. This is a great opportunity for a Data Scientist to get in on the ground floor of a very fast moving, high growth company in a very exciting and growing space. This position will directly contribute to the differentiation of the Ampion product. ', '● Provide feedback to other technical resources and input to Product Management ', 'We use agile development practices with multi-disciplinary teams that are typically focussed on delighting certain user persona’s. The Data Science team will work with each of the “experience” teams to build comprehensive data-based views of each persona and their journeys (key business processes), by being a consumer of data from these teams, and other sources, and being a provider of insights and data to these teams and their platforms. Our expectation is that the data structures and insights produced by the Data Science team will be embedded into our core product offering and used as one of our major differentiators. ', '● Proven experience in DBMS like Oracle, Postgres, MySQL, MS-SQL', '● Regularly attend team meetings to discuss projects, brainstorm ideas, and put forward solutions to any issues ', 'Clean Renewable Energy for Everyone We’re a fast-growing market leader who envisions a world where renewable energy powers our economy and society. Shared and sustainable energy assets, such as solar and wind farms, are the key to this vision, where healthy, inexpensive energy changes the world in which we live. It is a tremendous challenge with huge social benefits, and it is also one of the greatest economic opportunities in the history of business. ', '● Hands on experience with plotly/Dash, numpy, pandas, matplotlib, seaborn', '● Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering/Computer Science or related field', '● Experience with machine learning techniques and libraries such as tensor flow, pytorch, keras, scikit-learn, spacy, fast.ai is a plus', '● Deliver robust working code that implements data models as needed ', '● The ability to multitask, prioritize and get things done', '● Strong analytical skills', '● Excellent communication skills ', '● Partner with the Core, CRM, and “experience” teams to provide and receive data interfaces', '● Help build a data platform that is scalable, flexible, reliable, performant, maintainable and recommend the appropriate tooling to enable fast development of insights and reliable, cleansed data-sets that can be delivered to clients, customers and internal stakeholders', '●Proven experience in software development methodologies', '● Excellent organizational and leadership skills ', 'In addition, the Data Science team will also deliver insights to Ampion internal teams and most importantly provide a platform and tools on which functional owners can derive some of their own insights. The Data Scientist will lead the way in analyzing our data to provide insights for our clients and stakeholders and will work with the other members of the technical team to determine best short term and long term solutions to pressing Product data needs. The Data Scientist will provide feedback to the Product team on general approach and dependencies for roadmap and company plans. ', '● Proven experience in developing working models that deliver data-driven solutions']

An advanced degree (MS, PhD) in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Economics, Physics) a plus.', 'Productivity Tools - Email, Microsoft Office or equivalent', 'Be Scrappy We operate with an entrepreneurial mindset, testing and iterating, and starting with small budgets to prove our theories. Every team member contributes to profits and revenue, and is responsible for optimizing organizational resources, whether it’s time, money, or energy. We love to do a lot with a little, but aren’t afraid to invest when an idea shows traction.', 'You love to collaborate You work across functions (product, marketing, support, and engineering) to turn data and ideas into meaning for our users. You involve others throughout the data research and analysis life cycle and make it easy for them to participate in this process. You share and collaborate on your ideas and concepts with your peers, engineers, and other team members to solicit feedback early and often.', 'Summary', 'Default to Action Time is of the essence as work to solve the barriers for our business owners, so our team prioritizes quick decisions based on sound judgment. It’s also how we learn quickly, gather the right information, and refine our solutions.', 'Respect, Always Building a business is an emotional experience, so it’s important to always respond promptly and kindly to our small business owners. Actively solicit owner feedback, and anticipate their needs by getting to know them and their communities. Internally, our team communicates often, respectfully challenges one another to build the best outcomes, and works as a collaborative team to leverage our unique strengths.', 'Organizing disparate facts and findings into powerful narratives that have the broadest possible application within Hello Alice.', 'Role And Responsibilities', ' You can communicate effectively with business users The reality is that statistics are complex and difficult to understand. You understand how to go beyond the spreadsheet to craft a story that conveys your results persuasively, to anyone. This can range from the most mundane (Powerpoint presentation) to the most exotic (multimedia storytelling using interactive Javascript visualizations based on the latest D3 framework). You love to collaborate You work across functions (product, marketing, support, and engineering) to turn data and ideas into meaning for our users. You involve others throughout the data research and analysis life cycle and make it easy for them to participate in this process. You share and collaborate on your ideas and concepts with your peers, engineers, and other team members to solicit feedback early and often. You are an advocate for the business You have a deep passion for understanding the key challenges in our industry, and our business. You are fascinated by the subjects that will have the greatest impact, not the problems in themselves. You want to turn data insights into real solutions that impact the business and our customers. You make efficient predictions You have a broad knowledge of algorithms to select the right one, and moreover, know which features to adjust to best feed the model. You know how to combine different data so they complement each other. As a data scientist, you will champion processes that enable teams to use data in their work while staying nimble. You can work on a mass scale You know how to handle multi-terabyte datasets to build a robust model that holds up in production. You have a good idea of computation time, what can be done in memory and what, on the other hand, requires Hadoop and MapReduce. ['', '- PhD with 1 year of experience or MS with 2 years of experience in Data Science, Machine Learning, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, or another highly quantitative discipline.', 'What You Will Do:', '- Ability to learn new quantitative domains and modeling techniques.', '- Applied experience with agricultural science and/or agricultural datasets.', '- Strong communication skills for interactions with team members.', '- Manipulate, transform, and perform exploratory analysis on large and diverse agronomic datasets as part of building models.', '- Demonstrated experience building predictive machine learning, simulation, and/or statistical models.', '- Passion for writing well-structured, well-tested, maintainable, performant, and well-documented code, with an emphasis on scientific code.', 'Data Scientist ', 'Basic Qualifications:', '- Demonstrated experience building predictive deep learning models.', 'Looking for a highly motivated researcher with applied experience in data science and deep learning. The position is within the science R&D team that leverages modeling, big data, and cloud computing to address scientific challenges in precision agriculture. In this position, you will leverage data science and deep learning skills to analyze complex agronomic data and build predictive models.', '- Collaborate with team members and across the Science organization to deliver high-quality, reproducible research.', '- Experience with at least one deep learning model (DNN, RNN, etc.) and framework (tensorflow, JAX, pytorch, etc.).', '- Strong Python coding skills for data analysis and modeling, including experience with standard data science packages (numpy, pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, sklearn).', '- Self-motivated and able to work independently as well as part of a team.', '- Experience using version control systems, e.g. git.', '- Experience using tools for big datasets, such as SQL and PySpark.', '- Build and validate predictive models using diverse techniques that include but are not limited to deep learning, machine learning, process modeling, and statistical modeling.', 'Location: Remote/St. Louis, MO', '- Experience translating scientific models into code.', 'Preferred Qualifications:', '- Write robust, well-documented and well-tested research code and code libraries that adhere to community standards and best practices.']

The full Job Description can be made available as part of the hiring process.\u202f', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Having effective verbal and written communications skills.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing processes and tools\xa0that\xa0monitor,\xa0analyze\xa0and continuously improve\xa0model performance and data accuracy\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Using your experience with one or more of optimization toolkits/libraries like Cplex, Gurobi, Open source solvers (CBC, GLPK)', 'Walmart Global Tech is looking for an individual with expertise in the broader area of operations research to help build algorithms at the intersection of merchandising operations and supply chain. As part of the Merchant Tech Data science team, you would be responsible for research and development of the algorithms that power our core areas like pricing, assortment optimization, replenishment, labor planning etc. We are looking for individuals who are passionate about optimization and want to apply their skill set in field of retail.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You connect\xa0the\xa0how and why, using\xa0your knowledge\xa0of\xa0data science\xa0theories\xa0and\xa0methodologies\xa0to\xa0derive the best approach that is fit-for-purpose\xa0', 'You’ll sweep us off our feet if…\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You’re an inquisitive, out-of-the box thinker who’s continually on the lookout for opportunities to improve and innovate data science solutions\xa0', 'Benefits & Perks:', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Conducting\xa0exploratory\xa0analysis\xa0including hypothesis testing,\xa0statistical inference, and statistical analysis (predictive\xa0and/or prescriptive)\xa0', 'Working virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions, remove location barriers across our global team, be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting.\xa0Today, we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team. Of course, being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success. We’ll collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purpose.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Experience in large scale optimization , heuristics, decomposition methods for solving large scale problems, real time optimization, Reinforcement learning.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Being proficient with coding in one of the following languages (Python or C++)', 'You’ll make an impact by:\xa0\xa0', 'Benefits & Perks:\xa0', 'You have publications in\xa0Journals (ordered by rank): OR, EJOR, ORL, IJOC, IJPR, POM, WSC or INFORMS conference papersExperience in large scale optimization , heuristics, decomposition methods for solving large scale problems, real time optimization, Reinforcement learning.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Leveraging your PhD in Industrial Engineering, Operations Research or equivalent with thesis involving math modeling, Mixed Integer programming, Optimization (convex, non-convex) etc.', 'You have publications in\xa0Journals (ordered by rank): OR, EJOR, ORL, IJOC, IJPR, POM, WSC or INFORMS conference papers', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You have consistently high standards,\xa0your passion for quality is inherent in everything that you do\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Using your 4+ years of direct work experience in Operations Research or Industrial Engineering.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Partnering with business and technical stakeholders to translate\xa0challenging retail\xa0business problems\xa0into\xa0state-of-the-art data science\xa0solutions\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You have the courage to fail fast\xa0', '\u202f', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You have proven ability as a full stack data scientist\xa0who develops, optimizes, and scales\xa0models\xa0for the\xa0production environment\xa0', '\u202f\xa0', '(Bentonville, AR)', 'Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face. That’s what we do at Walmart Global Tech. We’re a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists and service professionals within Walmart, the world’s largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. To others, innovation looks like an app, service or some code, but Walmart has always been about people. People are why we innovate, and people power our innovations. Being human-led is our true disruption.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You\xa0have experience\xa0with\xa0Spark,\xa0Hive\xa0and TensorFlow etc.\xa0', 'You’ll sweep us off our feet if…']

['', 'Next Insurance is looking for explorers who are filled with curiosity, have the desire to travel the unbeaten path, and realize new heights in providing small business owners with the peace of mind to run their businesses. If you move fast, customer-focused, and willing to challenge the status quo, Next Insurance might just be your next journey.', 'Create deep-dive analyses to understand customer, operations, or funnel behavior', 'Be the connecting link to data engineering to design the right data model, logging, and data-pipeline foundations', 'Guide the team on experiment design and interpretation', 'Experience designing experiments, with knowledge of statistics a plus', 'What You’ll Do:\xa0', 'Want to shape the future of insurance through data science? We are looking for a Data Scientist to join the growing data org that has a dedication to diving into data and thinking statistically about business problems and user behaviors. The ideal candidate is excited to own company objectives and guide their team towards success through data-driven decisions. If you have the intuition to identify important analytical questions, the technical ability for complex deep-dives, and the communication skills to help the team turn ideas into action - you belong here!\xa0', 'Next Insurance is a fast-growing 400+ person startup based in Silicon Valley and is led by a team of experienced entrepreneurs with a history of successful outcomes. Our mission is to transform insurance for small businesses by combining world-class technology and phenomenal customer service to offer better insurance at a lower price. Next has raised over $630 million from top tier investors and is the valley’s latest unicorn, valued at over $2 billion.', 'Experience influencing the strategy of a product through analyses', 'Identify and help prioritize opportunities', 'Ability to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to the appropriate and accurate insights', 'Experience building clear and easy to understand dashboards', '\xa0', 'Work with cross-functional partners to determine the mission of their team, and design the right metrics and targets to communicate this mission', 'Professional experience in a quantitative analysis roleExperience influencing the strategy of a product through analysesComfortable in SQL and some experience with a programming language like Python a plusExperience building clear and easy to understand dashboardsAbility to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levelsAbility to define relevant metrics that can guide and influence stakeholders to the appropriate and accurate insightsExperience designing experiments, with knowledge of statistics a plus', 'Create a clear, compelling, and actionable narrative that is based on data-driven insights', 'Comfortable in SQL and some experience with a programming language like Python a plus', 'Work with cross-functional partners to determine the mission of their team, and design the right metrics and targets to communicate this missionCreate deep-dive analyses to understand customer, operations, or funnel behaviorIdentify and help prioritize opportunitiesCreate a clear, compelling, and actionable narrative that is based on data-driven insightsBe the connecting link to data engineering to design the right data model, logging, and data-pipeline foundationsDevelop dashboards to track metric progress, understand metric drivers, and answer common business questionsGuide the team on experiment design and interpretation', "One of our core values is 'Play as a Team'; this means making sure everyone has an equal chance to participate and make a difference. We win by playing together. Next Insurance is an equal opportunity employer and prioritizes building a diverse and inclusive workplace. We provide equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants of any type and do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, national origin, gender, age, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, genetic information or characteristic, gender identity and expression, veteran status, or other non-job related characteristics or other prohibited grounds specified in applicable federal, state, and local laws. Next's policy is to comply with all applicable laws related to nondiscrimination and equal opportunity and will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training.\xa0", 'Professional experience in a quantitative analysis role', 'Ability to communicate clearly and effectively to cross functional partners of varying technical levels', 'What We Need:\xa0', 'Develop dashboards to track metric progress, understand metric drivers, and answer common business questions']

['', 'Proficiency with version control systems and either R or SciPy preferred.', 'Maintain accurate and complete records.', 'Must have good communication skills.', 'Integrate datasets from external sources, including academic collaborators and third-party platforms.', 'Comply with all company SOPs and safety standards.', 'Hands-on experience with gene expression data and developing classifiers.', 'About our Company:', 'Exagen is a patient-focused and discovery-driven life sciences company dedicated to transforming the care continuum for patients suffering from debilitating and chronic autoimmune diseases.\xa0Our goal is to enable rheumatologists to improve care for patients through the differential diagnosis, prognosis, and monitoring of complex autoimmune and autoimmune-related diseases, including lupus and rheumatoid arthritis.\xa0By leveraging our proprietary Cell-Bound Complement Activation Products, or CB-CAPs, technology, we help get to the real cause of a patient’s symptoms and guide their journey to improved health.', 'A minimum of 2 years of industry or postdoctoral experience.\xa0', 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'Technical support for routine monitoring and quality controls of clinical laboratory data.', 'In this role, the Data Scientist (Bioinformatics) executes data mining, queries, and bioinformatics analyses relating to clinical studies, laboratory data, and product development.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Able to work independently and as a part of an interdisciplinary research group.', 'Data Scientist (Bioinformatics) ', 'Maintain confidentiality of customer and patient information.', 'Work with large datasets of clinical studies to design, develop, and perform analysis for internal and external uses.Work with genomics datasets of research studies to perform bioinformatics analysis, especially gene expression analyses.Able to set up NGS data pipelines.Technical support for routine monitoring and quality controls of clinical laboratory data.Help maintain internal databases and software.Conduct data analyses for experiments and projects, including clinical studies in the planning stage.Integrate datasets from external sources, including academic collaborators and third-party platforms.Collaborate with other scientific staff members within and outside the R&D group, including academic collaborators, external consultants, and scientists.Maintain accurate and complete records.Comply with all company SOPs and safety standards.Contribute to scientific publications in peer-reviewed journals and present at conferences in collaboration with academic collaborators.Perform other related duties as needed and required by supervisors.Maintain confidentiality of customer and patient information.', 'M.S. or Ph.D. degree in Bioinformatics, Biostatistics, or related fields with programming experience.', 'The statements herein are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by employees assigned to this classification. They are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills required of personnel so classified.', 'Conduct data analyses for experiments and projects, including clinical studies in the planning stage.', '\xa0', 'Proficient in Database (SQL Server, MySQL) and Server (Windows, Linux) Management.\xa0', 'Exagen is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity, or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements.', 'Perform other related duties as needed and required by supervisors.', 'Work with genomics datasets of research studies to perform bioinformatics analysis, especially gene expression analyses.', 'Collaborate with other scientific staff members within and outside the R&D group, including academic collaborators, external consultants, and scientists.', 'Competitive compensation packages | Generous PTO + 10 holidays | Medical, Dental, Vision, FSA, & Dependent Care| 401(k) retirement savings plan match | Life Insurance & Disability', 'About the Opportunity:', 'Able to set up NGS data pipelines.', 'Help maintain internal databases and software.', 'Hands-on experience with data processing, data analytics, and statistical analysis software.', 'Benefits', 'Work with large datasets of clinical studies to design, develop, and perform analysis for internal and external uses.', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Strong technical and theoretical background in data structures, analysis methods, and experimental design.', 'Contribute to scientific publications in peer-reviewed journals and present at conferences in collaboration with academic collaborators.', 'M.S. or Ph.D. degree in Bioinformatics, Biostatistics, or related fields with programming experience.A minimum of 2 years of industry or postdoctoral experience.\xa0Hands-on experience with gene expression data and developing classifiers.Hands-on experience with data processing, data analytics, and statistical analysis software.Strong technical and theoretical background in data structures, analysis methods, and experimental design.Able to work independently and as a part of an interdisciplinary research group.Proficient in Database (SQL Server, MySQL) and Server (Windows, Linux) Management.\xa0Must have good communication skills.']

job_title: Data Scientist, Health Economics and Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Fast Company’s', 'Comfortable with the command line/Unix systems.', '3+ years of SQL programming experience', 'POSITION LOCATION', 'The Data Scientist, Health Economics and Analytics role will aid in the research and development of novel methods for identifying medication optimization opportunities for patients with high risk/costs. In addition, they will be involved in the development, implementation and testing of data visualization tools and reports.\xa0The ideal candidate will have healthcare data analytics experience and a history of conducting real world evidence and/or health economic studies.', 'We are a precision medicine leader, providing evidence-based pharmacogenomic solutions that facilitate more personalized prescriptions across the globe. Our RightMed solution helps healthcare organizations, providers, and payers optimize patient outcomes and reduce costs by facilitating more personalized prescriptions. in publications used as evidence for locational protein targets', 'At Mantra Bio, we value Self-Empowerment, Candor, Curiosity, and Collaboration. You will use your expertise to gain insights into EV-cellular protein binding from proteomic, transcriptomic, and genomic data by applying existing methods when appropriate, and identifying opportunities to develop new methods to accelerate our exosome targeting capabilities. You will collaborate across Mantra Bio with Protein Scientists, Process Scientists, Data Scientists, and Engineers to rapidly implement, optimize, and scale up in silico experiments that guide in vitro and in vivo targeting efforts. You are creative and curious, as well as operationally-minded, detail-oriented, and able to run multiple projects in parallel to drive the team forward.', 'Fully stocked kitchen', 'PhD in statistics, computer science, biomedical informatics or related field, or MS degree with 3+ years relevant experienceStrong track record of scientific contributions in the development of machine learning or statistical methodsExpertise in Python or R for machine learning and statistical modelingExperience working with large datasets and creating complex data visualizationsDemonstrated ability to critically evaluate the quality of biological datasets based both on assays used and transparency of the data providedProven ability to foster strong interdisciplinary scientific collaborations with teams including wetlab research scientists, data scientists, and engineersHighly self-motivated individual contributor able to prioritize clear, succinct, and timely communication to work effectively within a dynamic teamAbility to implement pipelines to run experiments and analyze results at scale is a plusExperience with JupyterLab is a plusExperience with mass spectrometry data or a strong desire to gain this expertise is preferredFamiliarity with protein structure and binding prediction methods is a plusKnowledge of immunology, post-translational modifications, signaling mechanisms and other critical factors that impact translation of in vitro to in vivo results is a plus', '401k', "What we're looking for:", 'Work with target validation and protein scientists to generate hypotheses and coordinate execution of wetlab and drylab experiments to efficiently test these hypotheses', "At Mantra Bio, we seek to eliminate disease-related suffering to enhance the well-being of all. We believe that the key to creating cures is targeted, tissue-specific delivery of therapeutics for dramatically increased efficacy and reduced toxicity. To achieve this, our team of biologists, data scientists, and platform engineers have created REVEAL, a targeted cargo delivery platform that harnesses exosomes, the body's natural cellular transport system, to create\xa0highly tunable exosome therapeutics for some of the most devastating\xa0diseases. The foundation of our success is our truly interdisciplinary team of experts who work collaboratively to use the power of data science to fuel and accelerate our wet-lab successes. As a team, we value Self-Empowerment, Candor, Curiosity, and Collaboration and consider our human-centric culture to be our most important asset. We are proud to count 8VC, Viking, Illumina, Allen & Company and TenCent among our investors. Mantra Bio operates out of a newly constructed facility in South San Francisco.", 'Generous Parental Leave program', 'Develop novel computational methods as needed to advance our understanding of interactions between EVs and locational protein targets', 'Use appropriate machine learning and statistical methods to gain insights from our experimental data and publicly available proteomic, transcriptomic, and genomic resources', 'Demonstrated ability to critically evaluate the quality of biological datasets based both on assays used and transparency of the data provided', 'Collaborate with other Data Scientists on models, algorithms, and tools', 'Experience with mass spectrometry data or a strong desire to gain this expertise is preferred', 'Benefits', 'About the role:', 'Team-building events', 'Ability to implement pipelines to run experiments and analyze results at scale is a plus', 'in vivo', 'Create appropriate visualizations and tools to enable scientists to explore and gain actionable insights from the output of your algorithms']

job_title: Claims Data Scientist - Part time, flexible contract - REMOTE
job_text: ['', 'Ideal candidates will have several years of industry experience regarding data science claims data, advanced degree in a highly quantative discipline, hands on experience in IBM MarketScan and Optum Insight.', 'Barrington James are partnered with an award winning specialist consultancy who specialise in outcomes research, real world evidence, and epidemiology.', 'After a successful year and winning even more projects, they are hiring out for a key area of its business - Data Scientists working in Claims Data and Analytics.', 'For more information, apply below and our dedicated consultant will guide you through the entire process directly to the hiring manager.', 'They are also offering excellent hourly rates via your limited company or 1099, as well as a W2 offering.', 'This position is hugely exciting for a variety of reasons. Firstly, it is entirely flexible hours (~20hrs pw/min) which you can complete of an evening or over weekends.', 'In this role, you will have a hands on role in regards to comparative and effective analysis, effect measures, of claims data.']

['', 'Familiarity with big data and cloud technologies', 'What You’ll Need', 'As a Data Scientist you will create innovative solutions for understanding data patterns and relationships in chemical process applications. These solutions are applied both to design and to simulate such chemical processes, as well as to optimize operations and supply chains. We are looking for sharp, disciplined, and highly quantitative individuals who have a passion for predictive analytics. You are passionate for and excel at data analytics, including data mining, statistics, machine learning and mathematical modeling and optimization. You will be excited to both the appropriate methods to industrial data and you will not be deterred to develop new algorithms tailored to meet specific requirements set forth by the industrial application. You will leverage your skills and passion for Statistics, Machine Learning and AI to drive AspenTech’s Self-Optimizing Plant strategy by developing groundbreaking software solutions for modeling and analytics of manufacturing processes.', 'Excellent interpersonal, communication, writing, and presentation skills', 'Collaborate with customers, product managers, designers and developers to understand customer needs and translate them into product requirements and specifications', 'Familiarity with chemical engineering or manufacturing is a big plus', 'Track record of experience in Python programming, including data science specific packages, such as Pandas, Numpy, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn etc. Knowledge in C++ or C# is preferred, Julia is a bonus.', 'A track record of academic publications related to data science, AI and/or process optimization is preferred. Why Work at APL?The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory (APL) brings world-class expertise to our nation's most critical defense, security, space and science challenges. Your primary focus will be in applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction systems integrated with our products. This is an exciting opportunity to be part of a groundbreaking data science team; a lot of the work will be oriented towards developing proof-of-concepts for first in market solutions.\xa0', '\xa0building predictive models for clinical cognitive neuroscience applications\xa0', 'an opportunity to have a lasting impact on the way people and communities engage with brain and mental health, and even to affect the prognosis of people’s mental and brain health trajectory', '\xa0doing ad-hoc analysis and presenting results in a clear and concise manner. Cognitive Neuroscience experience is a plus.\xa0', 'The Company', 'go-getter personality capable of executing projects with minimal guidance and direction\xa0', '\xa0data mining using state-of-the-art methods', 'experience-based market salary & benefits.', 'passion for solution building', 'Skills and qualifications', '\xa0', 'a Boston-area based flexible work environment', '\xa0processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis', 'What We Offer', 'Responsibilities', 'We are a Boston-area digital health company that seeks to radically improve brain health outcomes by leveraging cutting-edge technology and machine learning to unlock precision brain health for as many people as possible. While we are steadfastly focused on individuals’ brain health, we believe that meaningful outcomes can only be achieved within an ecosystem of care that actively includes and engages physicians, professionals and caregivers. We invite qualified, collaborative, self-driven and impact-oriented professionals to join our dynamic and fast-growing team.', 'great communication skills', 'MS or PhD (data analytics) in Cognitive Neuroscience (preferred), Applied Math, Psychology, Biomedical Engineering\xa0', 'an exciting, dynamic start-up environment', '\xa0selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques', '\xa0enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems', 'excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, etc.', '\xa0selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques\xa0data mining using state-of-the-art methods\xa0processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis\xa0building predictive models for clinical cognitive neuroscience applications\xa0\xa0doing ad-hoc analysis and presenting results in a clear and concise manner. There will be opportunity to present at conferences and other meetings\xa0\xa0enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems', 'good applied statistics skills, such as distributions, statistical testing, regression, etc.', 'experience with common data science toolkits and standard coding practices including version control\xa0']

As a market-leading provider of cyber security solutions, Optiv has the most comprehensive ecosystem of security products and partners to deliver unparalleled services. Our rich and successful history with our clients is based on trust, serving more than 12,000 clients of varying sizes and industries, including commercial, government and education. We have the proven expertise to plan, build, and run successful security programs across Risk Management, Cyber Digital Transformation, Threat Management, Security Operations - Managed Services and Identity and Data Management.', 'Quantifying customer lifetime value to inform risk/reward decisions', 'Highly analytical mind with a passion for conducting complex data analysis', "A company committed to championing Diversity, Equality and Inclusion through Affinity groups including but not limited to, Women's Network, Optiv Pride, Black Employee Network, and Veterans Support Network.", 'Predicting financial outcomes leveraging a predictive model', 'Demonstrated analytical aptitude and mastery of data analysis & visualization tools', 'Professional training resources, including tuition reimbursement', 'Expertise in common data science toolkits and programming languages, including R & Python']

['', 'While\xa0Vianai\xa0is a part of each one of us, it isn’t all of us.\xa0\xa0', 'Expert & Student: We want to work with someone who has deep domain expertise and is also open and curious to new ways of doing things.\xa0Maker & Manager:\u202fSomeone who be hands-on and do the work, as well as\u202flead thought and teams. A colleague who will jump in the trenches and lead by example.\xa0Collaborative & Independent: Someone who values communication and connection with others and is able to collaborate as part of a team and work independently\xa0', 'Experience with Machine/Deep Learning software packages such as TensorFlow/MXNet/SparkML/R etc.\xa0', 'Able to work onsite in Palo Alto, CA,\u202for Tel Aviv,\xa0Israel\xa0', '\xa0\xa0', 'M.S. or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Statistics or related field\xa0Track record of developing novel learning algorithms/systems\xa0Professional experience in statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining practice\xa0Candidate should be able to in a\xa0multi-task\xa0creative environment, rapid prototype, and agile development environment.\xa0Experience with Machine/Deep Learning software packages such as TensorFlow/MXNet/SparkML/R etc.\xa0Ability to visualize data and present core insights in a clear and compelling way\xa0Excellent communication, relationship skills and a strong team player\xa0Able to work onsite in Palo Alto, CA,\u202for Tel Aviv,\xa0Israel\xa0Able to travel to customer site\xa0', 'We ask tough questions to each other and of ourselves. We don’t shrink from our responsibility to our community, and to all of humanity.\xa0', 'Track record of developing novel learning algorithms/systems\xa0', 'Qualifications\xa0', 'The Vianai technology principles and strategy are embodied by a next-generation platform for enterprise machine learning and AI that will\xa0dramatically\xa0increase the number of people who can build and train ML-centric applications.\xa0We plan to\xa0achieve\xa0this\xa0through a dramatic simplification and streamlining of the development experience, coupled with an unprecedented level of interactivity and\xa0explorability.\xa0', 'The Vianai platform delivers simplicity by tying together all the key tasks that a\xa0data\xa0scientist is responsible for in a single interactive\xa0and\xa0visual experience. Rather than having to master numerous libraries and environments,\xa0a data\xa0scientist can iterate over multiple versions of data, features and models in an environment that can be directly exposed to and shared with business domain experts, dramatically improving solution performance, cycle-time and buy-in. At the heart of\xa0our\xa0platform is a breakthrough,\xa0domain-specific language for Machine Learning and Data Science that is able to express all aspects of an algorithm (models and parameters) in a simple, fully running specification. Anyone who can write standard mathematical expressions can directly create optimized ML models that run and scale.\xa0', 'The Opportunity:\xa0\xa0', 'US West Coast, SF Bay Area preferred ', 'Collaborative & Independent: Someone who values communication and connection with others and is able to collaborate as part of a team and work independently\xa0', 'Experience with big data techniques (such as Hadoop, Spark)\xa0Hands on experience with deep learning with areas of computer vision, natural language processing techniques etc.\xa0Strong Industry domain knowledge and experience preferred\xa0Publication track record on deep learning / machine learning\xa0PhD degree in Computer Science, Physics, Applied Mathematics, Statistics or related quantitative field\xa0', 'Candidate should be able to in a\xa0multi-task\xa0creative environment, rapid prototype, and agile development environment.\xa0', 'Hands on experience with deep learning with areas of computer vision, natural language processing techniques etc.\xa0', 'Professional experience in statistical modeling, machine learning, or data mining practice\xa0', 'Ability to visualize data and present core insights in a clear and compelling way\xa0', 'Excellent communication, relationship skills and a strong team player\xa0', 'Expert & Student: We want to work with someone who has deep domain expertise and is also open and curious to new ways of doing things.\xa0', 'Publication track record on deep learning / machine learning\xa0', '\xa0', 'Experience with big data techniques (such as Hadoop, Spark)\xa0', 'About You:\xa0', 'Our company is founded on a culture of trust, empowerment and respect. We bring our whole self to work — the non-perfect, messy, sometimes imposter, sometimes expert, sometimes vulnerable and sometimes superhuman self that contributes to what we believe in. We strive to provide everyone, regardless of race, sex, age, gender, ability or sexual orientation, with a safe environment so each person can focus on doing what they do best, and help us change the world.\xa0\xa0', 'Where is the job?\xa0', 'We are committed to advancing inclusion, equity and diversity because we believe that to design more transparent and beneficial AI systems, we need architects of all types. And to us, the more perspectives the better. We don’t have all the answers, but we encourage questions and smart, creative people with diverse experience and expertise. The combination helps us gain clarity, find ideas and move to the best solution faster.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'M.S. or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Statistics or related field\xa0', 'Preferred Qualifications\xa0', 'Strong Industry domain knowledge and experience preferred\xa0', 'Able to travel to customer site\xa0', 'About Us: Who we are and How we Work:\xa0', 'Vianai is looking for experienced data science practitioners who are able to work with customers to identify and implement projects where our platform can be deployed to generate business value.\xa0\xa0', 'Maker & Manager:\u202fSomeone who be hands-on and do the work, as well as\u202flead thought and teams. A colleague who will jump in the trenches and lead by example.\xa0', 'Our ideal colleague:\xa0', 'We are professionals\xa0and experts\xa0focused\xa0on\xa0building\xa0organizational\xa0wisdom by\xa0activating\xa0artificial\xa0intelligence and\xa0amplifying\xa0human\xa0minds. We are also sisters and brothers, fathers and mothers, sons and daughters, partners and friends. Our family comes from around the world. We love the environment. We believe in science and in spirituality, and we honor every living thing that shares the planet with us. We are teachers, and we are lifelong students.\xa0\xa0', 'PhD degree in Computer Science, Physics, Applied Mathematics, Statistics or related quantitative field\xa0']

['', 'Bachelors in a quantitative field (e.g. mathematics, statistics, computer science, engineering, physics, quantitative social science)\xa0 and 4+ years post-collegiate work experience as an analyst or data scientist; or a Masters/PhD in a quantitative field with 2+ years work experience as an analyst or data scientist.', '*Please note- This position is open to candidates in the US and Canada only.', 'Job description', 'A serious passion for using data to build delightful products for our customers.', 'Each day, our users visit our app with the hope of connecting with someone. These interactions generate millions of data points that can be used to help us better understand our customers’ experiences.\xa0 We need you to ask and answer the questions that will transform this data into a better understanding of what our customers find delightful, and what they find painful, so that you can help drive changes that further our vision of helping singles form meaningful connections with other amazing singles!', ' ', 'When necessary, build models in R, Python, or other systems that help us better measure and understand the results of experiments or user flows.', 'Assist in feature development from ideation to execution, including helping with user research, determining the best way to test new product features, and running deep analysis of feature performance post launch.', 'Self-starter who can thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment, drive change through influence, and collaborate effectively with a variety of cross-functional stakeholders. Excited and hungry to try new tools and processes to achieve results.', 'Capable of condensing data and telling a persuasive story to technical and non-technical audiences.', 'Create internal dashboards to monitor the health of the product and business KPIs (growth, revenue, engagement).', 'Competency with developer tools like Git and Bash is a plus', '\xa0', 'Basic Proficiency in a scripting language like Python, R, or Julia', 'Coffee Meets Bagel', 'Responsibilities', 'High proficiency in SQL & business intelligence tools (e.g., Mode, Tableau, etc).', 'Qualifications', 'Deliver ad-hoc analyses and reports to support business needs, investigate, triage and resolve metrics-based issues without heavy guidance.', 'Create and share compelling presentations that motivates and inspires the team to build with conviction.', 'Work cross-functionally with product, design, finance, and engineering teams to provide data-driven insights that will help define the product & marketing roadmap and drive significant increase in core business KPIs (growth, revenue, engagement).Create internal dashboards to monitor the health of the product and business KPIs (growth, revenue, engagement).Deliver ad-hoc analyses and reports to support business needs, investigate, triage and resolve metrics-based issues without heavy guidance.Assist in feature development from ideation to execution, including helping with user research, determining the best way to test new product features, and running deep analysis of feature performance post launch.Create and share compelling presentations that motivates and inspires the team to build with conviction.When necessary, build models in R, Python, or other systems that help us better measure and understand the results of experiments or user flows.', 'Bachelors in a quantitative field (e.g. mathematics, statistics, computer science, engineering, physics, quantitative social science)\xa0 and 4+ years post-collegiate work experience as an analyst or data scientist; or a Masters/PhD in a quantitative field with 2+ years work experience as an analyst or data scientist.Experience applying statistics to rigorously analyze data and derive insights to solve ambiguous problems.1+ years designing and evaluating experiments or quasi-experimentsHigh proficiency in SQL & business intelligence tools (e.g., Mode, Tableau, etc).Basic Proficiency in a scripting language like Python, R, or JuliaCapable of condensing data and telling a persuasive story to technical and non-technical audiences.Self-starter who can thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment, drive change through influence, and collaborate effectively with a variety of cross-functional stakeholders. Excited and hungry to try new tools and processes to achieve results.A serious passion for using data to build delightful products for our customers.Competency with developer tools like Git and Bash is a plus', '1+ years designing and evaluating experiments or quasi-experiments', 'The Senior Product Data Scientist will be responsible for partnering with our product and growth teams to provide the facts needed to make better decisions and to delight our customers. You will be responsible for building a strong understanding of our ecosystem, working with the product team to determine which projects are the most important, and being willing to use the right tool (a scripted model, a dashboard, a presentation) to find and explain relevant information and insight that will help the company operate better.', "Coffee Meets Bagel's mission is to give everyone a chance at love. The app curates quality matches with fuller profiles that result in real conversations. Globally, CMB has generated millions of real dates and thousands of lasting relationships. Coffee Meets Bagel was named one of the Top 10 Dating apps by Time Magazine and the Best Dating App for Women by Refinery29. It has also been voted the #1 recommended dating app for singles looking for relationships.", 'Work cross-functionally with product, design, finance, and engineering teams to provide data-driven insights that will help define the product & marketing roadmap and drive significant increase in core business KPIs (growth, revenue, engagement).', 'Experience applying statistics to rigorously analyze data and derive insights to solve ambiguous problems.']

['', 'Work with internal teams (product development, client services, data operations) to translate analytical findings and model prototypes into product requirements and insights for clients', 'Desired Skills', 'Define Customer Needs and Pursue Solutions', 'Required Skills', 'Comlinkdata is seeking a highly analytical candidate to join our team as a Data Scientist on the Research and Development (R&D) team. The R&D team conducts early stage research to prioritize new product concepts, manages the short term product pipeline by taking products and features to at least a proof of concept stage, and identifies and integrates external data to compliment and enrich our existing proprietary data.', 'Strong toolkit of quantitative and qualitative analytical techniques rooted in business, economic and statistical analysis', 'Passionate about telling stories using data', 'At least 3 years of relevant work experience. Please note that we are interested in strong candidates of all experience levels. capabilities within business functions, essentially developing “citizen data scientists” within the business teams.  Show strong team building and creative thinking skills, and a desire to “make a difference”.Additional InformationAll your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.SDL2019-128']

['', 'Keeping in mind that we always ensure the tools we are using are fit for purpose, for our current projects, we are typically using Spark\u202f/ Scala or Teradata for\u202fdata preparation and Spark / Scala, R and/or Python for\u202fadvanced analytics.\xa0', 'Approximately 2+ years of hands-on experience in a highly technical analytics environment, carrying out data science work with large, complex datasets.', 'Retirement 401(k) plan with 6% employer contribution\xa0', 'As one of the world’s fully diversified data science and AI leaders we operate across every sector of the economy and we’re growing fast - with growth comes opportunity! We’re passionate about building out our team of smart, fun, diverse and motivated people.', 'Ideally you will have experience working closely with business stakeholders or clients, partnering with them to deliver end-to-end project solutions. The ability to clearly communicate technical concepts to a non-technical audience is key', 'Our team is committed to growing trusted relationships with our clients. For the current and upcoming projects, you may be required to work onsite at client offices for 80% of your time.\xa0We are happy to be creative with travel options to accommodate to individual needs.\xa0Our teams are currently based in San Francisco, Bentonville or Chicago.\xa0Travel depends on where our clients are based, need to be on site and clients’ relative openness to remote work (all teams are remote presently due to COVID concerns).', 'As we’re a Consultancy, you’ll get the opportunity to work on projects across different industries and partner closely with clients to understand their needs and help transform their questions and problems into analytical solutions.', '\xa0\xa0', 'Medical, dental, vision and life insurance coverage', 'Why should I be excited about this opportunity?', 'With our Americas team being established just over three years ago, this is a unique opportunity to join an exciting, high growth environment where each person can contribute and have a big impact on the success of the team, whilst knowing that you have global capability (proven products and solutions built over 18 years!) to back you.', 'We actively foster a culture where our people can stretch themselves to reach their full potential. We also know that work has to work for you, and modern life is fast paced and balance can be tricky. You want to work where you are respected and valued as an individual, not a number. Quantium embraces a flexible and supportive environment dedicated to powering possibilities for our team members, clients and partners.', 'Since 2002, Quantium have combined the best of human and artificial intelligence to power possibilities for individuals, organizations, and society. Whether it be building forecasting engines that materially drive down food wastage or creating tools that combat human trafficking, Quantium believes in using the power of analytics and machine learning for better goods, services, experiences for a brighter future.\xa0\xa0', 'Commuter tax benefit (in Chicago)', "You've mentioned consulting work. Tell me more about the travel requirements.", 'Experience in using at least one of Spark / Scala, Python or R and the desire to learn new languages and techniques', 'What is the team culture like?', 'Many things! Your role will likely evolve as we continue to grow but at its core, the Data Scientist is a technical role that delivers high quality end-to-end analytical support across multiple projects, as a member of a project team.', 'Can you share a little more on some of Quantium’s projects?', 'An understanding of the importance of strong data interrogation skills to achieve optimal outcomes', 'OK, this is all sounding great. But do you have a bullet point list so I can see if I meet the requirements of this opportunity?', 'FAQ', 'We know people are not bullet points but here we go:\xa0', 'What tools will I be using?', 'A degree in a quantitative discipline e.g. actuarial studies, mathematics / statistics, engineering ', '\xa0', 'What will I be doing as a data scientist at Quantium?', 'More about Quantium', 'We combine a team of experts that spans data scientists, actuaries, statisticians, business analysts, strategy consultants, engineers, technologists, programmers, product developers, and futurists – all dedicated to harnessing the power of data to drive transformational outcomes for our clients.', 'Approximately 2+ years of hands-on experience in a highly technical analytics environment, carrying out data science work with large, complex datasets.Experience working within Consulting or retail, CPG or banking is advantageousYou should ideally have experience in building models end-to-end (at least a handful through to production in a commercial environment), using techniques such as GBM/XG Boost, GLM (logistic regression), Clustering, Neural nets/deep Learning /deep nets, Multivariate regression An understanding of the importance of strong data interrogation skills to achieve optimal outcomesA degree in a quantitative discipline e.g. actuarial studies, mathematics / statistics, engineering Experience in using at least one of Spark / Scala, Python or R and the desire to learn new languages and techniquesIdeally you will have experience working closely with business stakeholders or clients, partnering with them to deliver end-to-end project solutions. The ability to clearly communicate technical concepts to a non-technical audience is key', 'Please note, this role is not suitable for Graduates. If you are a graduate and you’d like information about our Graduate Academy please visit https://au.gradconnection.com/employers/quantium/about-us/', 'Flights, accommodation and a food allowance for work travelMedical, dental, vision and life insurance coverageFlexible spending accountCommuter tax benefit (in Chicago)Retirement 401(k) plan with 6% employer contribution\xa0Annual bonus schemeAnnual company overnight trip and plenty of other team events', 'Annual bonus scheme', 'Annual company overnight trip and plenty of other team events', 'At Quantium, we seek out complex, technical problems. We leverage extremely large and often disparate datasets in the retail, CPG and banking industries to solve problems for our clients that have never been solved previously. These include business problems like optimizing product offerings, personalizing customer interactions, selecting best locations for stores/branches, improving inventory forecasting and pricing for some of the biggest companies in the world.', 'You should ideally have experience in building models end-to-end (at least a handful through to production in a commercial environment), using techniques such as GBM/XG Boost, GLM (logistic regression), Clustering, Neural nets/deep Learning /deep nets, Multivariate regression ', 'If you submit an application or expression of interest to The Quantium Group Pty Ltd, we may disclose your application or expression of interest on a confidential basis to our related companies, and joint venture companies, including Quantium Health Pty Limited. We will only make such disclosures for the purpose of considering your application or expression of interest and opportunities in those organizations.', 'Flights, accommodation and a food allowance for work travel', 'Experience working within Consulting or retail, CPG or banking is advantageous', '\ufeffThe opportunity', 'What else can I look forward to?', 'This will see you helping develop and deliver high quality data science solutions for our clients, from data preparation and cleaning, through to deploying and productionising models that are embedded in client systems.', 'These will typically be end-to-end data science solutions, including deploying complex models that underpin decision-engines our clients will deploy. We work in fast-paced environments on transformational projects with tight timeframes, often teaming up in agile delivery squads. Our projects are diverse, and our solutions have a big impact on our clients’ businesses, shaping the direction of their industries and the experience of the customers they touch', 'Quantium are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity. We are a multicultural team of various beliefs, sexual orientations and gender identities. We celebrate our diversity of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status and disability status.', 'Flexible spending account', "Are you working on data science problems but worried that your solutions may never be productionized? Do you want exposure to clients across a range of different domains? Perhaps you're looking for new and exciting ways to apply your technical skills to make a big and positive impact. If you are keen to accelerate your career in data science and start working on unsolved, intellectually challenging business problems, then look no further.", 'We are a team of diverse and fun data scientists, consultants and sales professionals working in an environment where colleagues quickly become friends. Working in small, cross-functional project teams, you will have lots of opportunity to learn from senior leaders and share your learning with the team too.']
