job_title: Data Scientist, Computer Vision and Document Intelligence
job_text: ['', 'Apply your expertise in image processing, analytics, and computer vision to inform a research group’s agenda and drive critical business outcomes. You stay connected to the wider research community as an active contributor.', 'Build state of the art vision and image processing capabilities in complex environments, building models and deriving insights from customer interactions and billions of existing images, and enabling products that help customers complete tasks.', 'Scientifically-minded. You have built models, validated them and backtested them. You know how to interpret a confusion matrix or a ROC curve. You have experience with pre-processing, feature extraction, deep learning, object detection, image segmentation, clustering, classification, and experimental design.', 'Team Description', 'Experience working with AWS', 'The Ideal Candidate Will Be', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'At least 1 year of experience with relational databases', 'At least 2 years’ experience with machine learning', 'Work on a wide variety of research problems and applied projects in the area of computer vision.Join a research group that’s part of driving the next wave of disruption at a new scale, using the latest in distributed computing technologies and operating across billions of customer transactions to unlock the big opportunities that help everyday people save money, save time, and eliminate problems in their financial lives.Work with cutting edge tools, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, gRPC, Podman, and Kubernetes.Use and contribute to state of the art methods, such as auto-encoders, deep networks, and classifiers. We do machine learning research and product development differently at Capital One. Partner closely with Software Engineers, Product Managers, and business stakeholders to discover, invent, and build at the largest scale. Ideas may come from internal projects as well as from academic partnerships with world-class institutions.Build state of the art vision and image processing capabilities in complex environments, building models and deriving insights from customer interactions and billions of existing images, and enabling products that help customers complete tasks.Apply your expertise in image processing, analytics, and computer vision to inform a research group’s agenda and drive critical business outcomes. You stay connected to the wider research community as an active contributor.', 'At least 1 year of experience with machine learning', 'Work on a wide variety of research problems and applied projects in the area of computer vision.', 'Use and contribute to state of the art methods, such as auto-encoders, deep networks, and classifiers. We do machine learning research and product development differently at Capital One. ', 'Partner closely with Software Engineers, Product Managers, and business stakeholders to discover, invent, and build at the largest scale. Ideas may come from internal projects as well as from academic partnerships with world-class institutions.', 'Curious and creative. You thrive on bringing definition to big, undefined problems. You love asking questions, and you love pushing hard to find the answers. You’re not afraid to share a new idea. You communicate clearly and effectively to share your findings with non-technical audiences.', 'At least 1 year of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysis', 'Join a research group that’s part of driving the next wave of disruption at a new scale, using the latest in distributed computing technologies and operating across billions of customer transactions to unlock the big opportunities that help everyday people save money, save time, and eliminate problems in their financial lives.', 'Bachelor’s Degree plus 2 years of experience in data analytics, or Master’s Degree, or PhD', 'As part of the Document Intelligence and Vision Engineering team, you will:', 'Curious and creative. You thrive on bringing definition to big, undefined problems. You love asking questions, and you love pushing hard to find the answers. You’re not afraid to share a new idea. You communicate clearly and effectively to share your findings with non-technical audiences.Technical: You have hands-on experience developing computer vision solutions from concept to production using open source tools and modern cloud computing platforms. You are not afraid of petabytes of data. Python is in your toolkit.Scientifically-minded. You have built models, validated them and backtested them. You know how to interpret a confusion matrix or a ROC curve. You have experience with pre-processing, feature extraction, deep learning, object detection, image segmentation, clustering, classification, and experimental design.Customer and product oriented. You share our passion for changing banking for good.', 'Customer and product oriented. You share our passion for changing banking for good.', 'At least 2 years’ experience in Python, Scala, or R', 'At least 2 years’ experience with SQL ', 'Work with cutting edge tools, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, gRPC, Podman, and Kubernetes.', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Master’s Degree in “STEM” field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics), or PhD in “STEM” field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics)Experience working with AWSAt least 2 years’ experience in Python, Scala, or RAt least 2 years’ experience with machine learningAt least 2 years’ experience with SQL ', 'Bachelor’s Degree plus 2 years of experience in data analytics, or Master’s Degree, or PhDAt least 1 year of experience in open source programming languages for large scale data analysisAt least 1 year of experience with machine learningAt least 1 year of experience with relational databases', 'Technical: You have hands-on experience developing computer vision solutions from concept to production using open source tools and modern cloud computing platforms. You are not afraid of petabytes of data. Python is in your toolkit.', 'Master’s Degree in “STEM” field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics), or PhD in “STEM” field (Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics)']

['', 'Develop and integrate machine learning algorithms for data processing and analysis', 'Excellent communication and presentation skills', 'Explore machine learning opportunities', 'Problem-solving aptitude', 'Build predictive models and machine-learning algorithms', 'Presenting information using data visualization techniques', 'Our vision is to accelerate the path to human discovery and medical cures. We are passionate about driving innovation and empowering consumers. We are proactive, collaborative, self-motivated learners, committed, bold and tenacious. We are dedicated to making this world a healthier place.', 'Explore machine learning opportunitiesInvestigate and compile new sources of medical dataProvide clinical input to refine existing machine learning architectureDevelop and integrate machine learning algorithms for data processing and analysisBuilding models to address business problemsPresenting information using data visualization techniquesUndertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured dataAnalyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patternsBuild predictive models and machine-learning algorithmsPropose solutions and strategies to business challengesCollaborate with engineering and product development teamsOther duties as assigned', 'Experience working in machine learning (preferred)', 'Other duties as assigned', 'Undertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured data', 'Propose solutions and strategies to business challenges', 'Provide clinical input to refine existing machine learning architecture', 'Building models to address business problems', 'Analytical mind and business acumen', 'Experience in data mining', 'Additional Information', 'Investigate and compile new sources of medical data', 'Highly analytical with a knack for analysis, math and statistics', "Medable's mission is to get effective therapies to patients faster. We provide an end-to-end, cloud-based platform with a flexible suite of tools that allows patients, healthcare providers, clinical research organizations and pharmaceutical sponsors to work together as a team in clinical trials. Our solutions enable more efficient clinical research, more effective healthcare delivery, and more accurate precision and predictive medicine. Our target audiences are patients, providers, principal investigators, and innovators who work in healthcare and life sciences.", 'Highly analytical with a knack for analysis, math and statisticsCritical thinking and problem-solving skillsPassion for machine-learning and researchExperience in data miningAnalytical mind and business acumenProblem-solving aptitudeExcellent communication and presentation skillsExperience working in machine learning (preferred)', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Engineering or relevant field\xa0', '0-3 years working in Computer Science or a combination of education and experience (3+ preferred)', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience with R programming language, C++, Python, Java, Node.JS', 'Qualifications', 'Passion for machine-learning and research', 'All information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.', 'Company Description', '0-3 years working in Computer Science or a combination of education and experience (3+ preferred)Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Engineering or relevant field\xa0Experience with R programming language, C++, Python, Java, Node.JS', 'Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns', 'Critical thinking and problem-solving skills', 'Collaborate with engineering and product development teams']

job_text: ['Experience with machine learning and statistical analysis of data', 'Experience with deep learning, reinforcement learning, natural language processing', 'Look for innovative ways to derive novel insights from sponsor data', 'Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment', 'Utilize statistical analysis, unsupervised machine learning, supervised machine learning, and deep learning as needed', 'Apply knowledge in machine learning, statistics, software development, and data science to solve challenges on datasets of all sizes and types', 'Effectively communicate results to both JHU/APL and sponsor leadership You meet our minimum qualifications for the job if you...', 'Collaborate with multi-disciplinary teams from across the Laboratory to design and execute technical studies across a variety of domains', 'Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills', "Are able to obtain an Interim Secret level security clearance by your start date and ultimately obtain a Final Secret level security clearance. If selected, you will be subject to a government security clearance investigation and must meet the requirements for access to classified information. Eligibility requirements include U.S. citizenshipYou'll go above and beyond our minimum requirements if you...", "Master's degree or higher in machine learning, data science, statistics, mathematics, computer science, or a related technical discipline", 'BS degree in data science, statistics, mathematics, computer science, or a related technical discipline', 'Experience with C#, Java, .NET, etc.', "Possess an active Secret (or higher) clearance Why work at APL? The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory (APL) brings world-class expertise to our nation's most critical defense, security, space and science challenges. While we are dedicated to solving complex challenges and pioneering new technologies, what makes us truly outstanding is our culture. We offer a vibrant, welcoming atmosphere where you can bring your authentic self to work, continue to grow, and build strong connections with inspiring teammates. At APL, we celebrate our differences and encourage creativity and bold, new ideas. Our employees enjoy generous benefits, including a robust education assistance program, unparalleled retirement contributions, and a healthy work/life balance. APL's campus is located in the Baltimore-Washington metro area. Learn more about our career opportunities at http://www.jhuapl.edu/careers.", 'Build models and simulations to describe data, predict events, and prescribe a course of action', 'Experience with R, Python, SAS, Matlab, or other programming environment', 'Explore current academic research to maintain technical edge']

['', 'This position can be a combination of either a business analyst or a BA/product manager\xa0with a strong tech background, or a solution architect who is a strong communicator and has a good understanding of business needs – with data engineering experience.', 'Strong Experience engaging with senior leaders--both technical and business in pharma and biotech', 'This position reports to the Chief Solutions Officer and will work in very close alignment with Customer Success to make the solution a reality for the customer. This role requires the ability to interface with, and articulate systems architecture to, business users, developers, architects, IT operations professionals, and senior IT management. ', ' ', 'An end-to-end advanced solution provider, this company helps break down silos, integrates data and analytics across Omics, Clinical Trials, and RWE to uncover novel insights and opportunities. Over the last 17 years, our client and its parent company have been the preferred data and analytics partner to over 150 clients including 15 of the top 20 large Pharma. \xa0', 'Role Background', 'Our client is undergoing a strategic transformation intended to put the company on a growth trajectory which will make it six times its current size over next five years. The company has been building its internal teams and capabilities with \xa0new talent who would bring with them new thought process and implementation skills and make this goal achievable.', 'Details', 'Experience in RWE / HEOR and commercial is a plus', 'This role is a remote/home-based role with travel expected in a post-Covid environment. ', 'Overview', 'Keen problem solving, able to rapidly ingest, absorb, synthesize and act on new information', 'Requirements', '\xa0', 'Self-motivated with excellent interpersonal and relationship-building skills', 'Experience supporting the sale of end-to-end data analytics projects or specific slivers of this value chain.', '10+ years of experience', 'As a Solutions Consultant, you will actively drive and manage the solutioning around IT opportunities within the R&D IT side of the life sciences sector (R&D IT). We are seeking an individual with a strong tech background in big data / data & Analytics / and data science.', 'Our client’s data and analytics solutions empower innovation in life sciences across the value chain from “molecule to market.” Their strategic advantage comes from a seamless amalgamation of data, deep domain expertise and data science. The company’s multifaceted team helps harmonize large volumes of disparate unstructured data; analyze data using cutting-edge AI/ML technologies, and galvanize data-driven decisions to unlock operational efficiencies and accelerate drug development. ', 'Ability to engage with customers to understand their needs and to work with sales and other professionals to propose solutions. Experience in RWE / HEOR and commercial is a plusA bachelor’s degree is required; a master’s degree is desirable with an academic discipline in computer science, business analytics, economics (with a BA focus), etc. 10+ years of experienceStrong Experience engaging with senior leaders--both technical and business in pharma and biotechExperience supporting the sale of end-to-end data analytics projects or specific slivers of this value chain.Deep understanding of the Data & Analytics value chain right from data-ingestion / processing including meta data management, semantic mapping, quality etc. / insight generation and delivery / overall DataOps process.Self-motivated with excellent interpersonal and relationship-building skillsKeen problem solving, able to rapidly ingest, absorb, synthesize and act on new informationThis position can be a combination of either a business analyst or a BA/product manager\xa0with a strong tech background, or a solution architect who is a strong communicator and has a good understanding of business needs – with data engineering experience.Ideal candidates will understand early stage R&D--mainly pre-clinical & phase 1&2 clinical trials.', 'We are looking for strong Solutions Consultant to join our client’s growing team. We are looking for someone who exudes a passion for understanding the needs of customers and articulating the value of services and solutions in meeting those needs.', 'In order to sustain and further grow its position in the global marketplace and sharpen its competitive edge, we are seeking to bring onboard an experienced Solution Architect / Pre-Sales professional. ', 'A bachelor’s degree is required; a master’s degree is desirable with an academic discipline in computer science, business analytics, economics (with a BA focus), etc. ', 'Life Sciences - Solution Architect / Pre-Sales Consultant', 'Ability to engage with customers to understand their needs and to work with sales and other professionals to propose solutions. ', 'Ideal candidates will understand early stage R&D--mainly pre-clinical & phase 1&2 clinical trials.', 'The Sales Zone, a national search firm with a rich history of helping grow companies and careers through recruiting top talent, is pleased to be engaged by a dynamic, growth company in the life sciences technology consulting firm.', 'Deep understanding of the Data & Analytics value chain right from data-ingestion / processing including meta data management, semantic mapping, quality etc. / insight generation and delivery / overall DataOps process.']

['', '...', 'As a Data Scientist at RappiPay, you are responsible for providing support to the different areas of the business: Fraud-Prevention and detection, Risk management, growth and customer reach, etc.. The ideal candidate should be comfortable using large data sets to find opportunities in the market, for our customers and products, as well as to find process optimization opportunities. The candidate must have strong experience using a variety of data mining/analysis methods, data tools and frameworks, as well as implementing, building, and testing data models. You will collaborate in a very rich and talented environment of Data scientists, Data engineers, and stakeholders throughout the globe to create impact in the business. We are looking for a passionate professional who wants to change the financial world as we know it.', 'Experience using statistical computer languages (R, Python, SLQ, etc.) to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets. Experience with data handling and manipulation such as Pandas. Experience cleansing, analyzing, and exploiting data. Understanding of financial data is a plus. Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks. Experience training, validating, and taking the models into production is a plus. Best practices for software development is a plus. A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques.']

job_title: Data Scientist in Remote Mental Healthcare
job_text: ['Full-time, remote position', 'But there’s so much more we can do with data to deliver better care and better outcomes to people in need. We can help our members (patients), therapists, and doctors make the most informed decisions at every step in the care cycle, helping each individual get the right treatment and the best results.\xa0', '● Experience with distributed processing methods and ETL systems. Familiarity with ML/AI workflows and lifecycle management (i.e. Kubeflow, Domino Data Lab, etc.) is a plus. ● Familiarity with the use of Python to work with large data sets within modern data science frameworks\xa0', '● Are a team of digital health veterans passionate about changing the way people get depression treatment\xa0', '● Are uncompromising in our clinical standards\xa0', '● Are a team that appreciates balance, diversity, and happiness\xa0', '● Design and build statistical algorithms and machine learning models to supportive effective clinical decision making on the Brightside platform\xa0', '● Offer competitive compensation, including salary, equity, and benefits and unlimited PTO in a remote environment.', '● Expert knowledge of SQL and database operations.\xa0', 'We’re looking for an outstanding data scientist to help us make it all happen, managing the entire process to deliver impactful clinical decision support that fundamentally changes antidepressant prescribing and clinical outcomes.\xa0', '● Self starter, comfortable working in a flexible and dynamic startup environment\xa0', '● Are user focused, empathetic, and design driven\xa0', '● Work with engineers and product managers to deploy algorithms and models into robust production models\xa0', 'This is a chance to have an important role in an innovative and transformative healthcare company and to positively impact millions of lives.\xa0', 'Data Scientist at Brightside', 'Around 20% of Americans experience depression and/or anxiety each year, yet fewer than half of people with depression get care and only a fraction of those who receive care get even “minimally adequate” treatment.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Key responsibilities:\xa0', 'We:\xa0', '● Are data driven and evidence based\xa0', 'You:\xa0', 'Brightside (www.brightside.com) offers expert, best practice, personalized care for depression and anxiety, from the comfort of home. We use over 100 data points about each patient and our PrecisionRx tool to determine the medication that’s best, then closely measure and monitor at each step, adjusting medication and dose until it’s just right. We have a massive and unique data set about depression and anxiety treatments and outcomes.\xa0', '● Are people who have seen depression up close, and who want to make an impact\xa0', '● Carry out first-principles exploratory analysis of our data set\xa0', '● Strong communication skills to present insights and summarizing complex data to diverse audiences.\xa0', '● MS or Ph.D. degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Operations Research, Mathematics, Physics, Economics, or other quantitative discipline.', '● Strong demonstrated expertise in designing, building and deploying statistical algorithms and machine learning models.\xa0', '● Lead the development of advanced clinical decision support and other solutions, including planning, design, execution, validation, deployment, and maintenance ● Manage data and ensure data quality and integrity\xa0', 'Brightside is an equal opportunity employer. We believe that diversity improves our working environment and our ability to offer a high value service to our customers.', 'We’re getting phenomenal results: 83% of Brightside members experience a clinically significant symptom reduction and 60% achieve remission levels within 12 weeks. Our mission is to deliver life changing depression and anxiety care to everyone who needs it.\xa0', '● Are capable of working with engineers to build an actual production system that uses machine learning and artificial intelligence. We don’t expect you to write\xa0production-quality code, but you should have some programming experience. ', '● Collaborate with designers to determine intuitive and elegant ways of surfacing algorithmic insights to clinicians\xa0']

['', 'Collaborate with the rest of the data team and partner marketing, product, content, design teams to build data solutions and products to drive user and revenue growth.', ' A Great Place to Work A CNBC Disruptor 50 in 2019 and 2020 A LinkedIn Top Startup in 2017, 2018, 2019 and 2020 ', 'About You', ' Masters or PhD in a quantitative field such as mathematics, statistics and engineering. 5+ years of experience as a data scientist focusing on building data solutions and/or machine learning products. Experience with machine learning techniques and sophisticated analytics (e.g. regression, classification, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization). Advanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data sets. Proficiency in Python or R. Great communication skills and ability to democratize data through meaningful insights and solutions. ', 'We Are Proud Of The World Class Products And Company Culture We Continue To Build And Have Been Recognized As', 'About The Role', 'Passion for working and learning in a fast-growing company', 'Your Day-to-day Will Involve', 'Build production grade models on large-scale dataset to measure effectiveness across growth levers by using statistical modeling, machine learning and analytics techniques.', ' Passion for working and learning in a fast-growing company ', 'Great communication skills and ability to democratize data through meaningful insights and solutions.', 'Advanced SQL skills - comfortable working with very large data sets.', 'A CNBC Disruptor 50 in 2019 and 2020', 'Work with multi-functional teams to implement insights and analytical solutions to empower data-driven decision making.', 'Experience with machine learning techniques and sophisticated analytics (e.g. regression, classification, time series, econometrics, causal inference, mathematical optimization).', 'Bonus Points', 'Proficiency in Python or R.', 'A LinkedIn Top Startup in 2017, 2018, 2019 and 2020', ' Build production grade models on large-scale dataset to measure effectiveness across growth levers by using statistical modeling, machine learning and analytics techniques. Leverage models and experimentations to scientifically quantify incremental changes from marketing, referral and content efforts and answer key growth challenges such as spend optimization, user segmentation and targeting, creative optimization and content recommendation. Collaborate with the rest of the data team and partner marketing, product, content, design teams to build data solutions and products to drive user and revenue growth. Work with multi-functional teams to implement insights and analytical solutions to empower data-driven decision making. ', '5+ years of experience as a data scientist focusing on building data solutions and/or machine learning products.', 'Join a leading fintech company that’s democratizing finance for all. ', 'Masters or PhD in a quantitative field such as mathematics, statistics and engineering.', 'Leverage models and experimentations to scientifically quantify incremental changes from marketing, referral and content efforts and answer key growth challenges such as spend optimization, user segmentation and targeting, creative optimization and content recommendation.', 'A Great Place to Work']

['', ' Experience with Spark, SQL, Tableau, Google Analytics, Hive and BigQuery (or any other Big data/Cloud equivalent) etc. ', '1.1.1.1', ' 2+ years experience with a fast-growing SaaS business based company is preferred. ', 'What Makes Cloudflare Special?', '  Partner and align with data scientists, business leaders, stakeholders, product managers and internal teams to enable machine learning solutions to key business problems..   Understand data landscape i.e tooling, tech stack, source systems etc. and work closely with the data engineering team to improve the data collection and quality.   Work with data scientists to ensure best engineering practices in the deployment, maintenance, and delivery of machine learning models and insights.   Use software engineering best practices to publish model scores/insights/learnings at scale within the company. ', 'Learn About Us', ' They say it’s all about location and Berkeley Lab has it all: a view above the San Francisco Bay, cool breezes, and world-class multidisciplinary science within a diverse and respectful research ecosystem of 5,000 people. Nearly 90 years ago, Ernest Orlando Lawrence, the inventor of the cyclotron, brought physicists, biologists, engineers and mathematicians together in Berkeley above the University of California campus to tackle the most urgent scientific challenges. Today, after garnering 13 Nobel Prizes, Berkeley Lab has sustained and grown that tradition of open, interdisciplinary team science, exemplified by how the U.S. Department of Energy Joint Genome Institute (JGI) addresses the most pressing energy and environmental challenges using integrative genome science approaches. JGI takes up residence in the new, state-of-the-art Integrative Genomics Building (IGB) along with the U.S. Department of Energy Systems Biology Knowledgebase (KBase) to expand the frontiers of energy and environmental science in partnership with the worldwide community of researchers. Will you join us and be a critical part of our next ground-breaking discoveries? ', ' Lead, mentor and train graduate students, technical staff, and other group members, as necessary. ['', 'New York, NY', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'Experience using data visualization platforms such as Tableau, Google Data Studio, and Python preferred', 'DATA SCIENTIST – ROLE OVERVIEW', 'As a Data Scientist, you will be working cross-functionally throughout various internal teams to help deliver proper business decisions. Deep knowledge in one or more following areas - Bayesian methods, Econometrics, Reinforcement learning, Gradient boosting machine, Natural language processing, Computer vision and etc.  Be motivated, self-driven in a fast (we truly mean fast) paced environment with a proven track record demonstrating impact across several teams and/or organizations. Ability to communicate and collaborate effectively with business stakeholders and manage tasks in a timely manner. BS degree in Computer Science, a similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience. 1+ years of working experience in building production-grade machine learning systems including continuous integration and continuous deployment for machine learning models, online and offline model inference and etc. 3+ years of working experience in software engineering roles. ', 'Research and prototype new modeling ideas to continuously optimize model results.', "With annual revenues of more than $100M and a vibrant company culture, Rokt has been listed in both Built In NYC's ‘Best Places to Work' NYC and ‘Great Places to Work' US. Our award-winning culture is guided by our four core values: Smart with Humility, Customer Obsessed, Conquer New Frontiers, and Enjoy the Ride. These values help us recruit, retain, and promote the right talent around the globe and ensure we have the right conditions to do our best work. Rokt closed our Series D in 2020, raising US$80m from TDM Growth Partners and existing investors.The investment supports our continued investment in research and development.", 'Benefits:', "  Work with the greatest talent in town. Our recruiting process is tough. We hold a high bar because we have a high performing culture - we only want the brightest and the best.  Join a community. We believe the best things happen when we come together to solve complex problems and make meaningful connections with each other through interest groups, sports clubs, and social events.  Accelerate your career. Develop through our global training events, ‘Level Up' investment, online training courses and our fantastic people leaders. Take your career to Rokt'speed - the average time between promotions is 12 months.  Take a break. When you work hard, we know you also need to rest. We offer generous time off and parental leave policies.  We also offer a paid Rokt'star Sabbatical for employees who have been with us 3 years or more.  Stay happy and healthy. Enjoy catered lunch 3 times a week and healthy snacks in the office. Plus, join the gym on us! Access generous retirement plans like a 4% dollar-for-dollar 401K matching plan in the US. In the US, get fully funded premium health insurance for your whole family.  Become a shareholder. All Rokt'stars have stock options. If we succeed, everyone gets to enjoy the upside.  See the world! Along with our global all-staff events in amazing locations (Phuket, Thailand in January 2020), we also offer generous relocation packages for those interested in moving to another Rokt office. We have cool offices in great cities - Tokyo, New York, Singapore, Boston, Sydney. We believe in equality. Rokt is an Equal Opportunity Employer and recognizes that a diverse workforce is crucial to our success as a business. We would love to hear from you - irrespective of socio-economic status or background, age, gender identity, race, religion, sexual orientation, color, pregnancy, carer/family responsibilities, national and social origin, political opinion, marital, veteran, or disability status.", 'The optimization team is responsible for the research and development of the machine learning services that are used across the Rokt network. Biotech & start-up experience a strong plus (Degree in: Statistics, Computer Science, Neuroscience, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics or related)', 'If interested, please send your CV and statement of interest to hiring@compasspathways.com', 'Provide expertise company-wide ranging from data science & analytics to more traditional statistical and computer science analysis in order to improve the patient journey and provide mission-critical applications as COMPASS grows', 'Proficient in at least one of Python (scikit-learn, numpy, pandas, matplotlib) or R (tidyr, dplyr, ggplot2, Rstudio)', 'Work collaboratively with engineering (back-end/front-end/UI+UX/ and others) to deploy these algorithms in a highly scalable and distributed infrastructure to help patients in real time', 'Ability to work in the US', 'Experience in modern front-end development and data visualisation', 'The position reports into the VP of Digital Health Research', 'Background in EEG, fMRI, and other brain measurement technologies a strong plus', 'hiring@compasspathways.com', 'Profile', 'COMPASS Pathways is a mental health care company dedicated to accelerating patient access to evidence-based innovation in mental health (https://compasspathways.com). Our focus is on improving the lives of those who are suffering with mental health challenges and who are not helped by current treatments. We are pioneering the development of a new model of psilocybin therapy, in which our proprietary formulation of synthetic psilocybin, COMP360, is administered in conjunction with psychological support.', 'How to apply', 'Job overview', 'Comfortable with Linux and the AWS cloud environment', 'Familiar with R Shiny and/or other modern front-end development and data visualization technologies', 'Additional qualifications - preferred', 'The Data Scientist will support a diverse set of initiatives including statistical computational modelling, advanced analytics and AI projects. You will partner with internal and external stakeholders to develop insights and models to advance discoveries in mental health care.\xa0', 'COMPASS Pathways is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All employment decisions are based on business needs, job requirements, and individual qualifications, without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, and related medical conditions), ethnicity, age, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, military service, genetic information, familial or marital status, or any other status, category, or characteristic protected by applicable law.', 'Experience with Tensorflow/Keras and/or Pytorch. Previous background in NLP and/or computer vision a strong plus', 'US applicants', 'Industry experience as a data scientist in a digital health organisation, pharma, or biotech', 'Understanding of a variety of statistical and/or machine learning methods (regression, statistical hypothesis testing and design of experiments, tree-based algorithms, supervised vs unsupervised learning). Expert knowledge in a selection of several key areas', 'Strong alignment with core company mission and values Compassionate, Bold, Rigorous, and Inclusive', 'Strong analytical, project management, written and verbal communication skills', 'Ability to operate independently and in cross-functional teams in an entrepreneurial and rapid growth-oriented environment', 'Roles and responsibilities', 'A PhD in a computational field (Degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Neuroscience, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics or related)', 'Note that we are not able to sponsor employment visas at this time, and therefore can only accept applications from people who have employment rights in the US.', 'Work closely with stakeholders to identify quantitative and technological needs for various COMPASS projects']

In this role, you will build/manage our Big Data pipelines and manage data migrations.Machine Learning Engineer: Data Engineer skillset plus experience with Machine Learning concepts, frameworks and infrastructure. Here, you will scale our data science models into production-level applications.Visualization Engineer: Angular/React, Java, Tableau. Create customized dashboards for reporting or forecasting models. Create customized dashboards for reporting or forecasting models. This can be through full-stack web applications, Tableau or a combination of the two.', 'Accessibility at Citi', 'Ability to pass technical interviews consisting of basic algorithmic programming exercises.', 'Visualization Engineer:', 'Knowledge of agile(scrum) development methodology is a plus.', 'Degree, certification or commensurate skills in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Statistics, Mathematics or a related field.', 'Must be collaborative and adaptable, with good communication skills.', 'Training', 'Pay Transparency Posting', 'Machine Learning Engineer:', 'EEO Policy Statement', 'Job Family:', 'Qualifications', 'EEO is the Law', 'Experience designing and interacting with databases.', 'System level understanding - Data structures, algorithms, distributed storage & compute.', 'Time Type:', 'Experience with containerization and related technologies (e.g. Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus.']

['', 'About Global Tech\xa0', 'Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face. That’s what we do at Walmart Global Tech. We’re a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists and service professionals within Walmart, the world’s largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. To others, innovation looks like an app, service or some code,\xa0but Walmart has always been about people. People are why we innovate, and people power our innovations.\xa0Being human-led is our true disruption.\xa0', ' - Proven track record in innovation and research such as hackathon, blog posting, conference presentation, and publication.', 'Minimum Qualifications', ' -\xa0Advanced degree (Master or\xa0PhD)\xa0in\xa0any STEM field plus\xa0five\xa0years of related experience.', 'Being human-led is our true disruption.', ' - Use machine learning, deep learning\xa0and\xa0data\xa0mining techniques to develop robust\xa0predictive\xa0models in areas such as\xa0E-Commerce & Financial Service fraud detection,\xa0anomaly detection, abusive returns, and product recommendation.', 'We’re virtual', ' - Proficient in machine learning and\xa0data\xa0mining packages in Python and other open source packages.', "We are looking for a passionate,\xa0creative\xa0data\xa0scientist professional to join\xa0Inkiru\xa0Data\xa0Science team @WalmartLabs. You will have the unique opportunity to work with massive business and social\xa0data\xa0generated by Walmart\xa0Inc.'s unparalleled online and offline commerce.\xa0You will be responsible to use cutting-edge machine learning,\xa0deep learning, data\xa0mining, and optimization techniques to design and prototype robust,\xa0scalable predictive models\xa0and analytics solutions.\xa0You will be a part of a cross-functional team of\xa0scientists, engineers,\xa0product managers,\xa0and business professionals that sit at the intersection of\xa0data\xa0science,\xa0big\xa0data,\xa0IT infrastructure, and business operations.", ' -\xa0Research and develop state-of-the-art algorithms that address complex business problems.\xa0', ' - Programming skills in one of the following languages:\xa0Hive\xa0SQL,\xa0Java, or JavaScript\xa0on a UNIX or Linux platform.', 'We’re virtual\xa0', ' (Will consider 100% remote candidates but highly prefer candidates to work out of Sunnyvale, Dallas, Hoboken, Reston OR Bentonville.)', 'Additional Preferred Qualifications', 'Working virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions, remove location barriers across our global team, be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting.\xa0 Today, we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team. Of course, being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success. We’ll collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purpose.\xa0\xa0\xa0', '- 5+ years relevant industry experience (3+ years in Risk Management preferred)', '\xa0', 'Responsibilities', 'About Global Tech', 'Team Summary', ' - Perform hands-on\xa0data\xa0exploration, processing, and analysis\xa0on massive\xa0data\xa0sets.', '- Technical expertise in\xa0data\xa0mining, machine learning, statistical analysis, and/or deep learning.', '- Ability to work in a fast-paced, iterative development environment.', 'Inkiru is a fraud & risk engine that develops Enterprise Risk as a Service using machine learning and deep learning techniques to mitigate various types of risk by aggregating information from omni-channel touchpoints such as sign up, sign in, profile changes, purchases, returns, listings, reviews, and customer contact, etc.', ' - Pull\xa0data\xa0from warehouse and cloud, perform feature engineering, back-test models, compare model performances and communicate the results\xa0to stakeholders.\xa0', ' - Experience working with large\xa0data\xa0sets and distributed computing tools (Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, or Spark).\xa0', '- Experience in operating from a cloud environment such as Google Could Platform or Microsoft Azure.', ' -\xa0Good\xa0communication skills, ability to work with cross functional teams of technical and non-technical members.']

job_title: Data Scientist / Senior Data Scientist - Core Services
job_text: ['', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Experience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments)', 'M.S. degree in Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields with 3+ years of industry experiencePh.D. in Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fieldExperience in experimental design and analysis (e.g., A/B and market-level experiments)Experience with NLP is a plusExperience in algorithm development and prototypingExperience with productionizing algorithms for real-time systemsProficiency in Java or ScalaPassion for Uber!', 'M.S. degree in Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields with 3+ years of industry experience', 'Proficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark', 'About The Role', 'Use large scale data processing such as Spark, Hive, and Uber’s proprietary machine learning platform, and more', 'Work with a cross-functional team that includes product management, engineering, operations and others to execute on projects', 'Ability to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data sets', 'Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analytics', "What You'll Do", 'Customer Obsession Data Science', 'Drive clarity and solve ambiguous, challenging business problems using data-driven approaches', 'Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. (If M.S. degree, a minimum of 1+ years of industry experience required and if Bachelor’s degree, a minimum of 3+ years of industry experience as a Data Scientist or equivalent)', 'Ph.D. in Statistics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative field', 'Experience with NLP is a plus', 'Propose and own data analysis (including modeling, coding, analytics, and experimentation) to drive business insight and facilitate decisions', 'Ph.D., M.S. or Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Machine Learning, Operations Research, or other quantitative fields. (If M.S. degree, a minimum of 1+ years of industry experience required and if Bachelor’s degree, a minimum of 3+ years of industry experience as a Data Scientist or equivalent)Knowledge of underlying mathematical foundations of statistics, machine learning, optimization, economics, and analyticsKnowledge of experimental design and analysisExperience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis and testing, and model developmentAbility to use a language like Python or R to work efficiently at scale with large data setsProficiency in languages like SQL, R, and Spark', 'Proficiency in Java or Scala', 'Knowledge of experimental design and analysis', 'Collaborate with engineering to write and implement algorithms in production', 'Experience with productionizing algorithms for real-time systems', 'Experience with exploratory data analysis, statistical analysis and testing, and model development', 'Passion for Uber!', 'Develop and lead statistical and machine learning efforts in relation to your projects. Our projects use machine learning, experimentation, signal processing, time series analysis, geospatial analysis, natural language processing, and more. We’ll give you as many challenges as you can seek and help you grow to tackle more.Use large scale data processing such as Spark, Hive, and Uber’s proprietary machine learning platform, and moreCollaborate with engineering to write and implement algorithms in productionWork with a cross-functional team that includes product management, engineering, operations and others to execute on projectsDrive clarity and solve ambiguous, challenging business problems using data-driven approachesPropose and own data analysis (including modeling, coding, analytics, and experimentation) to drive business insight and facilitate decisionsA few recent problems involve building machine learning models to deliver contextual support content for eaters, riders, and earners by content recommendation; and; intelligent policy optimization', 'A few recent problems involve building machine learning models to deliver contextual support content for eaters, riders, and earners by content recommendation; and; intelligent policy optimization', 'Experience in algorithm development and prototyping', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Develop and lead statistical and machine learning efforts in relation to your projects. Our projects use machine learning, experimentation, signal processing, time series analysis, geospatial analysis, natural language processing, and more. We’ll give you as many challenges as you can seek and help you grow to tackle more.', 'The Safety and Insurance Data Science and Analytics team']

['', 'Take a leading role in the production of Spotify’s public-facing user growth estimates on a quarterly basis.Enrich the suite of our forecasting models by researching and implementing cutting-edge technologies in the field of AI & ML models for time series forecasting.Develop scalable solutions for forecasting Spotify’s growth and work closely with Data Engineering to put your solutions into practice.Contribute to a machine learning framework to measure and predict Spotify user lifetime value metrics.', 'Take a leading role in the production of Spotify’s public-facing user growth estimates on a quarterly basis.', 'Develop scalable solutions for forecasting Spotify’s growth and work closely with Data Engineering to put your solutions into practice.', 'Contribute to a machine learning framework to measure and predict Spotify user lifetime value metrics.', 'Degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Econometrics, or another quantitative field.5+ years of relevant experience, particularly in forecasting time series using Python, SQL, and/or R.Strong mathematical and statistical understanding of models for time series forecasting.Previous industry experience with frameworks such as Tensorflow and the with data pipeline tools like Apache Beam, Scio, etc., and cloud platforms like GCP or AWS are a plus.', 'Degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Econometrics, or another quantitative field.', 'Enrich the suite of our forecasting models by researching and implementing cutting-edge technologies in the field of AI & ML models for time series forecasting.', 'Strong mathematical and statistical understanding of models for time series forecasting.', "What You'll Do", 'We seek an exceptional Senior Data Scientist to join our Forecasting team in New York', 'Previous industry experience with frameworks such as Tensorflow and the with data pipeline tools like Apache Beam, Scio, etc., and cloud platforms like GCP or AWS are a plus.', 'Who You Are', '5+ years of relevant experience, particularly in forecasting time series using Python, SQL, and/or R.']

['Strong organizational and communication skills, especially as relates to the documentation of experiments and code.', 'Here at eBay, we love creating opportunities for others by connecting people from widely diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and geographies. So, being diverse and inclusive isn’t just something we strive for, it is who we are, and part of what we do each and every single day. We want to ensure that as an employee, you feel eBay is a place where, no matter who you are, you feel safe, included, and that you have the opportunity to bring your unique self to work. To learn about eBay’s Diversity & Inclusion click here: https://www.ebayinc.com/our-company/diversity-inclusion/.', 'use of cookies', 'Our Trust Science Team Uses Machine Learning To', 'Predict and prevent bad buyer and seller experiences', 'EEO is the Law Poster Supplement', 'eBay is a global commerce leader that allows you to influence how the world buys, sells, and gives. You’ll be part of a work culture that’s been genuinely committed to diversity and inclusion since its founding more than 20 years ago. Here, you can be yourself, do your best work, and have a meaningful impact on people across the globe. We seek people with drive, ideas, and a passion for helping small businesses succeed to help shape the future of eBay—does this sound like you? If so, we’d love to talk to you!', "You will work on a team of data scientists charged with improving eBay's trust science, with tremendous impact on eBay’s unique community of buyers and sellers.", 'Use machine learning and data analysis to aid in data science solutions that will drive an improved experience for buyers and sellers.', "You will work on a team of data scientists charged with improving eBay's trust science, with tremendous impact on eBay’s unique community of buyers and sellers.Collaborate with other researchers, engineers, and product teams to develop strategic and tactical improvements to our trust platforms.Use machine learning and data analysis to aid in data science solutions that will drive an improved experience for buyers and sellers.Work with data scientists, engineers, and cross functional teams to improve existing data science solutions and prototype new solutions. ", 'Assess marketplace trust and reliability', 'Predict and prevent bad buyer and seller experiencesDetect and prevent frauds and scams to build a trusted marketplaceAssess marketplace trust and reliabilityBlock messages that could lead to fraud in real-time', 'Work with data scientists, engineers, and cross functional teams to improve existing data science solutions and prototype new solutions. ', 'For more information see: EEO is the Law Poster', 'Practical skills in data analysis and visualization, utilizing tools such as Tableau or Power BI. Effective written and verbal communication skills. ', 'Build and prototype analysis pipelines iteratively to provide insights at scale. Build and prototype analysis pipelines iteratively to provide insights at scale. Develop comprehensive knowledge of Google data structures and metrics, advocating for changes where needed for product development. Interact cross-functionally, making business recommendations (e.g., cost-benefit, forecasting, experiment analysis) with effective presentations of findings at multiple levels of stakeholders through visual displays of quantitative information. Research and develop analysis, forecasting, and optimization methods to improve the quality of Google's user facing products. "]

['', 'Bachelors or advanced degree in data science, statistics, computer science or a related quantitative discipline.', 'Partner with the other food team members, data scientists, product team staff, and engineers to develop tools, processes, and models to enhance our food data and metadata.This may include:Increase data volume: assessing data and APIs from potential vendors, identify and develop processes or models to source, clean, normalize, dedupe, map and tag new data (e.g. via vendors, OCR, NLP, search)Enhance data quality: perform exploratory analysis on our data, quantify data quality issues, cross validate data quality among sources, and develop tools, models, and processes to improve metrics.Enhance our global food ontology by programmatically sourcing data, metadata, and synonyms, develop models and tools to map the world’s ingredients, foods, and dishes to our concepts.Enhance and develop approaches (such as NLP, clustering, embedding) to associate high quality metadata such as dietary and allergen tags to our foods.Partner with other data scientists to develop models, such as embeddings or natural language processes, to create new or enhance existing food-data related data products.Partner with the search team to improve member food search experience.Motivate and mentor other data scientists to grow their skills and careers.', '1+ years of experience building and implementing machine-learned models in industry or academia. Bonus points for experience in the food data space.', 'Partner with other data scientists to develop models, such as embeddings or natural language processes, to create new or enhance existing food-data related data products.', 'Expert knowledge of Python / R and SQL, or similar industry standard tools used for large-scale data analysis and modeling.', 'Increase data volume: assessing data and APIs from potential vendors, identify and develop processes or models to source, clean, normalize, dedupe, map and tag new data (e.g. via vendors, OCR, NLP, search)', 'Self-motivated, results oriented, enthusiastic, and a creative thinker.', 'Enhance data quality: perform exploratory analysis on our data, quantify data quality issues, cross validate data quality among sources, and develop tools, models, and processes to improve metrics.', 'Enhance our global food ontology by programmatically sourcing data, metadata, and synonyms, develop models and tools to map the world’s ingredients, foods, and dishes to our concepts.', 'Recent experience with a digital company is a plus.', 'Some knowledge of production software best practices: git, CI/CD, linting, and testing.', 'Experience with cloud data warehouse (BigQuery, Snowflake), Google Cloud or AWS Platform (GKE, S3, Dataflow, Beam, Tensorflow) and other big data technologies a plus.', 'Motivate and mentor other data scientists to grow their skills and careers.', 'Partner with the other food team members, data scientists, product team staff, and engineers to develop tools, processes, and models to enhance our food data and metadata.', 'Enhance and develop approaches (such as NLP, clustering, embedding) to associate high quality metadata such as dietary and allergen tags to our foods.', 'This may include:', 'Some familiarity with application infrastructure: database technologies, containerization, and API standards. Bonus points for data visualization (such as D3, streamlit, flask)', 'Good communication and presentation skills. Ability to synthesize, summarize, and share issues, examples, and progress to a variety of technical and non technical stakeholders and partners.', 'Experience with advanced modeling techniques, such as predictive modeling, matrix factorization, time series analysis, classifiers, and ensemble methods. Bonus points for natural language processing.', '1+ years of experience building and implementing machine-learned models in industry or academia. Bonus points for experience in the food data space.Bachelors or advanced degree in data science, statistics, computer science or a related quantitative discipline.Experience with advanced modeling techniques, such as predictive modeling, matrix factorization, time series analysis, classifiers, and ensemble methods. Bonus points for natural language processing.Good communication and presentation skills. Ability to synthesize, summarize, and share issues, examples, and progress to a variety of technical and non technical stakeholders and partners.Expert knowledge of Python / R and SQL, or similar industry standard tools used for large-scale data analysis and modeling.Some knowledge of production software best practices: git, CI/CD, linting, and testing.Some familiarity with application infrastructure: database technologies, containerization, and API standards. Bonus points for data visualization (such as D3, streamlit, flask)Experience with cloud data warehouse (BigQuery, Snowflake), Google Cloud or AWS Platform (GKE, S3, Dataflow, Beam, Tensorflow) and other big data technologies a plus.Recent experience with a digital company is a plus.Self-motivated, results oriented, enthusiastic, and a creative thinker.', 'Partner with the search team to improve member food search experience.']
